Dhuthar sthuthichu vazhthum sundharanam manavalane1 Avanente rekshakan avanenikullon

Sthuthikalilunnathane
Nammil nalthorum cheitha nanmakal orthu
Paaduka nee ennum maname1 Ammyayepole thathen

Sthuthichiduveen keerthanangal Devanu paadiduvin
Sthuthi uchitham manoharavum nallathumennarivinDevaathidevanne paaril vannu papiye thedivannu
Vallabhanai marichuyarthu jeevikkunnu namukkaiThirukkarangal nirathivachu tharakangal gagane
Orukki’avan namukku rakshaa maarga’mathinnu munnameKandilla kannukalee karunayin karachalanam
Kettilla maanavarin kaathukal than vachanamThalamurayaai avan namukku nalloru sankethamam
Palamura naam paadeeduka paramanu sankirthanamDyanikuvin thankrupakal pukazthuvin than kriyakal
Manithanam than nama mahimakal varnnikuvin;-Manam thakarnnorkarulumaven krupaude paricharanam
Dhanam sukam santhoshamellam namukuthan thirucharanam

song.slide2:
Sthuthichidam ennum Yeshuvin
Sarvajanagalum aamodayami
Thappukal veenakal meettinam paduka
Sthothra’yagangale ennumennumHalleluyah halleluyah
Halleluyah avan nallavanallo
Halleluyah daya ennumullathePapathe vittu nam oodiduka
Papavazikale vittiduka
Pathakarkay jevan thannuvallo
Pavanaray jeevichidam;- Sthuthi..Priyante snehathe keerthikuvan
Aayiram navinal sadyamalla
Enkilum rakshakan panapathram-nalthorum
Eduthu njan sthothram cheyyum;- Sthuthi..Vairiganam ettam kruddikatte
Kanikalum kuzhikalum bhavichidatte
Yeshuvin snehathil ninnenne
Verpirikan iva sadyamalla;- Sthuthi..Than makal’kanandam nalkiduvan
Thathen vegam vanil vannidume
Aayiram aayiram vishudarumay
Nitya’yugangal vanidume;- Sthuthi..

song.slide2:
Sthuthikalinmel vasikunnavane
sarva mahathwathin yehovaye
padume nin dayaye dhinavum
paridathil en yathrayathil1 Paradhesiyai jan parkunna veettil
ninte mozhikal enikennum keerthanam
ente asrayam ninnilennumullathal
klesangal marannu jan viruthinai odunnu2 Kannuneer kanumpol manasaliunna
karunain kannulla karunnyavarithe
ente daivavum sashwatha parayume
ninnil njan marayunnu saswatha rekshakai3 Prelobhanangalum prethikoola kattukalum
vishwasa jeevithathil aanjadichidumpol
vishwasa nayaka ninnil mathram nokki jan
visramamillathe viruthinai odunnu

song.slide2:
Sthuthikam nammal nandhiyal
Sthuthikam parisuthane
Sthuthikam puthrane thanna deivathe Sthuthikam, SthuthikamAayathal dhurbelan njan belavanai
Sadhu njanum dhannyanai
Yeshu ente rekshakan aayathal
Sthuthikam, SthuthikamVanagam nammal bhakthiyal
Vanagam parishudhane
Vanagam puthrane thanna daivathe
Vanagam, Vanagam ; - Aayathal… Give thanks with a grateful heart
Give thanks to the Holy one
Give thanks because He’s given
Jesus Christ, His Son (Repeat)And now let the week say ”I am strong”,
Let the poor say, “I am rich”
Because of what the
Lord has done for us.
Give thanks, give thanks, give thanks,

Sthuthikum njan avane
Vazthum than namathe
En jeeva’kalamellam
En prananayakaneOrikal njan kandu aa diyva sneham
Annalil avan ennodu cholli (2)
Kaividukilla aa.. aa.. aa.. aa..
Kaividukilla lokathyatholam
Njan nine ennum vazi nadayhum;-Orikal njan kandu aa diyva sneham

Enkilum enne aa.. aa.. aa.. aa..
Enkilum enne thallidathinnum
Marvodu cherthu priyan vazinadathum;- Sthu...Orikal vagdatham nalkiya Nathan
Vegam varunnu vanvithanathil (2)
Enne cherppanai aa.. aa.. aa.. aa..

Than kanthayay njan orungi nilkum;-

Sthuthikku yogyanam Yeshuvinne
Vallabhanemikku valiyava cheithu

Nallidayanam nada;

song.slide2:
Sthuthikkunnu njaan en daivame
Nandi ennÝeshuparaa
1 Paapathil ninnenne veendavane
Paaramelenne niruthiyone
Unnathapadaviyil iruthiyone
Nalla karthave sthuthi ninakk;-2 Praanane maranathin pidiyil ninnum
Aayussine kannuneeril ninnum
Adhvaana’phalathe nashdathil ninnum
Sukshicha daivame sthuthi ninakk;-3 Kaathukalum nalla kannukalum
Kaikaalukal’kkaa’rogyatheyum
Deer’ghaayussum mana’samaadhaanavum
Thanna karthaave sthuthi ninakk;-4 Bhauthika nanmakal thannavane
Jeevitha’saukaryangal thannavane
Nalla’kudumbam thannavane
Priya karthaave sthuthi ninakk;-

song.slide2:
1 Sthuthipin sthuthipin anudinam sthuthipin
Yeshudevane sthuthichiduvin
Sarvva vallabhanaa-mavanunnathanaam
Namme veende’duthonavanaamAa....aanandamaay sthuthi paadiduvin
Jeevanaadhane pukazhthiduvin
Sathydaivamavan nithyajeevanavan
Swargga vaathilum vazhiyumavan2 Thirukkara thalathil namme varechuvallo
Paranaadiyil munnarivin
Oru naalumathaalavan thallidumo
Namme per cholli vilichuvallo;-3 Oru janani than kunjine marannidilum
Avan marakkukill-orickkalume
Swantha jeevaneyum thannu snehichavan
Namme kaathidumanthyam vare;-4 Kshaamam perukidilum bhumi kulungidilum
Janam aakularaayidilum
Daiva paithangal naam thellum bhayannidumo
Thuna vallabhaneshuvallo;-5 Meghavaahanathil swarggadootharumaay
Madhya vaanilavan varum naal
Thirusannidhiyil namme cherthanackkum
Sarvva thumbavum pariharikkum;-

1 Sthuthippin sthuthippin daiva janame
Sthuthikalinmel vasikkum priyane
Anudinamavan chaitha nanmakal
Analpame manam marakkumo2 Unarnnu khoshippin swantha janame
Hridayam nanniaal niranju kaviyatte
Paapakoopathil kidanna naaminnu
Parante vakthatha sutharallo3 Villchavanude gunangal khoshipaan
Thiranjeduthathaam vishudha vamsame
Jayaprabhuvinte kripa labhichathaal
Jayathin khoshangal muzhakeedaam4 Parante snehathaal param prakaashipan
parishudhanude parama sanghame
Karangalil namme vahikkunnonavan
Bharangal dhinam chumakkunnu5 Kripayinnalmavil nirayaam nammude
Dhurithangal himam polealiyatte
Parama villiyude virudhinnai namme
Villichavanennum nadatheedum6 Vrathaganangale cherkkuvanai nee
Varunna kaalamingaduthu poyathal
Athinnai njangale orukka vegamai
Aamen karthaave nee varename

song.slide2:
Sthuthippin! sthuthippin
Yesudhevane-Halleluyah paadi
Sthuthippin! Sthuthippin! Yesudevane
Sthuthippin lokathin paapathey neekkuvaan
Adhipanaivanna daiva kunjadine;-Karuna niranja kannullonavan-
than Janathin karechil
Karalalinju kelkum kaathullon-
Loka paapachumadine
Shirassukondu chumannozhi'ppathinu
Kuriseduthu gol'gothaavil poyone;-Vazhiyum sathyavum jeevanume
Avanarukil varuvin
Vazhiyu'maaswaasa'mekumeyavan
Paapachu'madozhichaven
Mazhayum manjum peyyumpozullil krupa
Pozhiyume megha'thunil-ninnu paadi;-Marichavaril'ninnadyam janichaven
Bhumirajakenmare
Bharichu vazumeka'nayaken namme
Snehichaven thiru'chorayil
Kazuki nammeyellam shudi-
karichu visvastha'sakshiye ninachu;-Ezhu pon nilavilakukal'lullil
Nilayanki'dharuchum
Ezhu nakshathram vamkayilum marvil
Ponkacha'pundum
Vayilirumuna valu'magni'jwala
pole kannumulla manava makane;-Kalukal'ulayil kachi'pazuppicha
Nalla pichala'kottathum
Chelodu'muka'bhava'mathithyan
Shakthiyodu'prakashikum
Poleyum thalamudi dhavalappangi
Poleyumirikunna daiva'puthrane;-Valare'vellatthinn'irachil'kottatum
Shava'kkallarayil ninnu veliye
Maricho'ruyirthuvaruvanay thakka'vallabha'mullathum
Eliya janam chevi'kolvathumaya
valiya ghambera'shabdavu'mullone;-Valiya daiva'duthante shabdavum
Deva kahalavum thante
Viliyodid kalarnnu muzangave
Vana'lokathil'ninneshu
Jewlikumagni megathil velipedum
Kalangum dushtar than'makal'anandikum;-Manneva mannanakunna masihaye-
Mahasenayin karthane
Mannum vinnum padechavaney manuvele
Manu'nandhanane para nandhanane
Meri nandhanane raja-nandhanane
Ningal nanniyodu padi;-Halleluyah padi sthuthippin'yeshuve
Yeshu namathinu jayam
Allalellam'avan'akale kaleyume
Yesuraajavinosanna!
Nallavanam Yeshurajan varum sarva
Vallabha Yeshuve vegam varename;-

Sthuthippin sthuthippin sthuthippin
Sarva vallabhanesuvine
Kaalakalamellam nammekathavane

Nammeyennum paripalikkum

Mannavan yeshuve pinthudaraam

Padeedam Halleluia

Innaleyum innumennum ananyene! vandanam-vandanameRaajaadhi raajaavu nee ennum karthaadhi karthaavum nee
Unnatha devaa! neeyenneyum snehichatháthbhutham athbhuthame-Shaaronile rosa nee enikkaaromal snehithan nee
Enmel viricha nin snehakkodikkeezhi-lennumen vishraamame-Aadiyumanthavum nee paapa vyaadikku vaidyanum nee

Swarga’bhaagyam ethrayogyam aarkku-varnnikkaam
Athin bhaagyam’orkkum’thorum’enikkaasayerunne!1 Paapalokaththil kidu paadupedu - eni-
Kkeppozhente mokshaveettil chnnu-chernneedaam2 Mumpe mumpe poyidumpol bhaagyamullavar-manni-
lulla kasdathakal neengi svasth-araayavar3 Loka-sambandha-bhavanam vittupoyennal- mokshe
Kaikalal theer-kaaththa-veettil paar-thidamello4 Randinaal jarangi-janum vaanji-cheedunnue-aathma-
Vendeduppaam puthra-santhosha-thi-lethi-duvaan5 Ingupedum paadukal-kkaa-svaasam praapippaan-ente
Ma-gala-moksha-purathil-eppozethum jaan?6 Praavinepol randu chira-kundennakil jaan-
Seeghram ethum parannte manavaalan sannidhau.

Swarga nattilen priyan theerthidum
Swantha veettil chaernniduvaan
Mama’kandhane onnu kaanuvaan
Manam kaathu paarthidunnu1 Innu mannithil seeyon yathrayil
Ennum kinnatha mathram
Ennu vannu nee’yenne cherkumo
Anne theeru vedhanakal 2 Maru bhumiyil thalharaathe jan

Oru nallum nee piriyaathenne
Karuthunnu’kanmanipol3 Nalla naadhane ninakkayi jan

Allal theernnu nin savidhe’varaa
thilla paaril vishrhamavum4 Karthru kaahalam vaanil’kelkkuvaan
Kalamereyille priyane
Aashayerunne ninne kaanuvaan
Aamen Yeshuve varane

song.slide2:
Swargasthnaya pithavinu sthothram
Sthuthyanam yeshu maheshanum mahathvam
Nityavumen perken priyan cheytha
Nisthulya nanmakalkai sthuthichidunneSthuthichidunne njan sthuthichidunne
Parama’pithavine sthuthichidunne
Avanente balamulla sangethame
Ente asha nikethameAvanetne pranane maranathil’ninnum
Ente kannine kanneril ninnum
Avanente kaline veezchayil ninnum
Viduvichathorthullam sthuthichidunneJeevante vaziyil njan nadakolluvathinay
Jeevante vachanngal avanenikeki
Avayilen gamanathe sthiramakiyathinal
Akamazinj’almavil sthuthichidunneAashrayamavanil njan puthukidum’thorum
Aashvasamennullil perukivarunne
Aasritha’valsalanam priyan’ente
Aamayam neekiyathal sthuthichidunne;-Seeyonil van pani theerthu vin thejass-
Len priyaneshu velippedum sudinam
Ettam samepa’mennor’thorungan alma-
Hemamaven thannathinal sthuthichidunne;-

song.name: Swargathekkal unnathanakum
song.slide:
സ്വർഗ്ഗത്തേക്കാൾ ഉന്നതനാകും കർത്താവാം ക്രിസ്തേശു
രാജരാജൻ ദൈവകുമാരൻ മനുഷ്യനായ് ജനിച്ചു1.മനുഷ്യജന്മം എടുപ്പാനായ് യരുശലേമിൻ ബേത്ലേഹേമിൽ
മറിയയിൻ മകനായ് പിറന്നു
ദൈവകുഞ്ഞാടായവൻ പിറന്നു
ഒരുആട്ടിൻ തൊഴുത്തതിൽ കിടന്നു... ഇമ്മാനുവേൽ
ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ
ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ2.ക്രിസ്തുരാജൻ ജനിച്ചപ്പോൾ ഒരു നക്ഷത്രം ഉദിച്ചുവല്ലോ
നമ്മുടെ ഇരുളാം ഹൃദയത്തിലും
വെളിച്ചമാം മശിഹാ ഉദിക്കട്ടെ
ഇന്നു വെളിച്ചമായി മശിഹാ ജനിക്കട്ടെ...ഇമ്മാനുവേൽ
ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ ഹാലേലുയ

song.slide2:
1 Sworgeeya pithaave nin thiru hitam
Sworgahile pole bhoovil aakkane
Nin hitham cheithonam nin suthane poley
Innu njan varunne nin hitham cheivaanEn deivame ninnishtam cheyyuvaan
Vaneedunne njaninnu mothammai
Ente eshtam onnum venda priyane
Ange eshtam ennil poornamaakane;-2 Nanmayum poorna prasathavumulla
Than hithamenthennu njanariyuvaan
En manam pudukki marridunne nithyam
Ninnyamanekki loga lavanyam;-3 Njanavanullam kayyilirikkayaal
Aarumilenikku dhosham cheyyuvan
Ennenikkuvannu neridunnathellam
Nin hitham aanennu njanariyunnu;-4 En thalyile mudigalumellam
Nirnayamavannenni yariyunnu
Onnathil nilathu veenidanamengil
Unnathanarinje sadhyamayidu;-5 Yesu christhuvin sareera yagathil
Ulla eshtathil njan suthanaai theernnu
Deiva eshtam cheithu vakdhatham prbhippan
Purna sahishnatha egane priya;-6 Aarumariyatha sreshtta bhojanam
Njan bhujichu nithyam jeevichidunnu
Ente rakshakante eshttamellam cheithu
Vela thigaikkunnathente aaharam;-

song.name: Swargiya naathaa jeevante datha
song.slide:
സ്വർഗ്ഗിയ നാഥാ ജീവന്റെ ദാതാ
സ്വർഗ്ഗസേനകൾ സദാ സ്തുതിച്ചീടും ദേവ
കർത്താധി കർത്താവാം രാജാധി രാജാവേ
വീഴുന്നു പാദത്തിൽ സ്തുതി സ്തോത്രം അർപ്പിച്ചു. (2)1.പാപികളാം നമ്മെ തേടി വന്നു
കണ്ടെത്തുംവരെയും അന്വേഷിച്ചു
പാപപരിഹാരാർത്ഥം ചോര ചിന്തി വീണ്ടെടുത്തതാൽ
നന്ദിയോടടിയങ്ങൾ അങ്ങെ വാഴ്ത്തീടുന്നിന്നും
വീഴുന്നു പാദത്തിൽ സ്തുതി സ്തോത്രം അർപ്പിച്ചു. (2)2.ജീവിതം കർത്താവിന്നർപ്പിച്ചാലും
സാക്ഷിയായി മരണം വരിച്ചീടിലും
സീമയറ്റുള്ളതൻ നിത്യസ്നേഹത്തിന് ബദലാകുമോ?
ഉയിർത്തുന്നു പൊൻനാമം പാരിതിലിന്നെങ്ങും
വീഴുന്നു പാദത്തിൽ സ്തുതി സ്തോത്രം അർപ്പിച്ചു. (2)

Swarlloka paura janame tharumo ie lokam sthira’dhanamo sukhamo?
Nammalkkenthinee yulakin mahima? Kristhuvinte ninda chumakkaam1 Vilayerum ninam chorinju namme veendeduthathavanaam
Thante kalchuvadukale nokki pintudarum nammal’anyar’ulakil;-2 Paripaavananaay nadanna paraneshu’vodeeyulakam
Perumaari’yethiraayittenkil namukke’thiraakuvath’atbhuthamo?;-3 Avan mulam bhuviyulavaam apamanam nithya-dhanamam
Avan manichidum nithya-thejass dharippikkum daiva dutha sadassil;-4 Ihaloka chintha vedinje swantha’naattilekke thirinje
Namukkaayi veedorukkum nadhan varavinnay kathirikkaam priyare!;-

song.slide2:
Swatham ninakkini njaan
Yesudheva! Papa bhendham
Neekkennil ninnen Priyanadha!1. Santhoshamennu peyin vazhi nadannen-athu
Chathivennunarnnu ninno Daduthu vannen2. Impam paapam tharume-nazhinju chaithen-athu
Earey thumpam thannathal Bhayennu vannen3. Lokam thunekkumennu cherinnirunnen-athil
Ottum sthirathayillanjodi-vannen4. Kayem bhelam sukhavum
Karuthil vechen-ithin
Kazhcheyanityamenni-Thaa varunnen5. Dheham jeevanumninmun
Kazhchavechen-ini
Chaiven ninthirumanam pole ennum6. Sakthi prapthi dhanavum
Kazhchavechen-thiru santhosham
Neduvan jaan aduthu vannen7. Thaanghi nadathename
En karthave! paaram
Thalarnnitha vanneedunnen dayavaney.

Thamasamo varavinu
Ethranal ihathil njan kathidenamMuthumanikalal nrmmithamam

Thedivanno dhoshiyam enneyum ennyum natha
Ithramam sneham uirkoduthenikai
Mannava varnnippan eluthalla enike1 Kshonithale kshenam bhavichidathenneyum natha
Aanippazhuthulla panikalale
Preenich anugrehicheduka nithyam;-2 Poshippika pathya vachanamam ksheerathalenne
Nirmmala thoyam nithyam kudippichu
Pachapul sayayil kidathidunnenne;-3 Nirthiduka kalankamatteshuve karaillathenne
Palunku kadal theerathirunnu janente
Mathura gana retham’athileri gemippan;-4 Kunjadinte kude gemichavar padume modhal
Seeyon malayil seemayattanandham
Enninim labhikumo’malprana natha;-

Thejasil yeshuvin ponmukam jan kanum
Kalamettam aasanname
Athennasaye athennanadhame
Athen prethyasayin prebhathame1 Aanandha dayakanam en priyane kandidumpol
Kannu’neerellm neengidume
Ente allalake’akannidum
Enikanandhame yuga yugam;-2 Vagdatha’nadathile sashwathamam veetilen
Sevakar daiva dhutharallo
Daiva’ponmukam dhinam kandidum
Shutharodonnai jan sthuthichidum;-3 Ie mannilente klesam alppakalam mathram
Manju’pom athu kinavu’pol
Nithya’thejassin kanamanathin bhala
En priyanannu nalkidum;-4 Ha! Ethra bhagyamen jeevithathinekiya
Prana priyanen premodhame
Avanente’upanithi kathidum
Vanamekathil enne cherthidum;-

Thiruhitham’pol nadathename

song.slide2:
Udaya nakshathram vanil udichidarai
Prebhayerum prebhatha’mingaduthidarai
Thiru’sabhaye vega’munarnniduka
Rajathirajane ethirelkuvan1 Irulerum ee loka’yathrayil nam
Irulinte prava’rthikal uringeeduka
Loka’mohangal muttum pari’thyajikam
Rakalam theerarai pakal varunne;-2 Ihathile durithangal sara’makenda
Mahathaya prathi’bhalam namukundallo
Daivabhayathil visudharai theeram
Than velayil vardichu vanneedam;-3 Kannuneerum neduveerpum neengidume
Karthavinodu nam chernnidumpol
Anachidume than pon thiru’marvil
Aamoda-purnnarai nam koode vanidum;-4 Visudha’niniyum thane thane vishudee’karikatte
Neethi-cheyunnonathikam neethi cheyatte
Malinnyam vattam kara’kalelkatha
Manavattiyai namo’rungeedam;-

1 Udayavaneshuvennidayanallo
Ulayukayilla njaaneeyulakil
Aanandame paramaanandame
Njaanennum naadane pukazhthidume2 Pacha pulppurangalil kidathidunnon
Shudha jalameki pottidunnu
Neerumen praanane thanuppichu than
Neethiyil nayikkum salpaathakalil3 Bheethiyezhaathenne nadathidunnu

‘Vandanam yeshupara’ enna reethi

ullaasamaay nadakkum sahodaraa! nallapol chintha cheyka
pullin poo pole ninte prabhaavangal ellaam ozhinjidume1 nalla sukham balavum ninakkunde-nnallo ninackkunnu nee?
thellu nerathinullil avayonnu millaatheyaay bhavikkaam2 mallanmaaraayulakil jeevichavarellaam ippolevide?
nalla pol chinthikka nee avar shava kkallaryilallayo?3 ellaa janangaleyum vayalile pullinu thulyamaayi
chollunnu sathyavedam lavaleshamilla vithyaasamathil4 kallupole kadutha nin hrudayam thalliyudappathinnaay
chelluka yeshu paade avan ninne thallukayilla drudam5 vallabhaneshuvine snehikkuka illayo snehithaa nee?
nallidayan ninakkaay jeevan vedinj illayo krooshathinmel

Unaram daiva sabhaye
manavalante varavinai
orungam daiva jenamemanavalane

song.slide2:
Unarnezunelkuka thirusabhaye
Mnavalente varavinay orungiduka
Varumathi vegamennaruliyavan
Parivaragaloditha varunnu vanil;-Varume vanathil priya kanthan
Pathinayirangalil athishrshtan
Viravodavane nam ethirelkan
Orugam orugam thiru’sabhayeUdayan aruliyo’radayalangal
Bhuvil niraveru’nnoronnay niraverunnu
Kodiya vinakalengum nadamadunnu
Daiva’sabaye nin thalaye nee uyarthiduka;-Ashudhamam vasanathe erinjiduka
Divya’mahathwathinnalankaram dharichiduka
Vishudiye thikachu nee orungi ninnal
Swarga’mahimayil manavalan anachidume;-Prathiyogi vaziyikalil ethirthidatte
Prathikulagal anudinam perukidatte
Jayaveran Yeshu mun nadannedume
Ninte karam pidichanudinam nadathidume;-Nodi nerathekulla durithamunde
Athi’noduvilo nithyamam mahimaude
Anithyamam sukathe nee veruthidumpol
Nitya’mahathathin prathiphalam anadamallo;-

song.slide2:
1 Unaruka sabhaye uyarthuka shirase
Manavalan varavettam aduthupoi orungiduka
Thalarathe vanaviravil nam
Chiraka’dichuyarnneeduvan
Aathma’puthu behelam dharichiduka;-2 Marubhoovil ninnum priyanmel chaari
Mohana’rupiyai varnnatham ivalaro
Parthale kashtam sahicha
Thante parisutha manavattiyam
Sathya sabha’ithennarinjeeduka;-3 Parannidume najan marannidume ente
Mannile kastanga’lakilavum oru dhinathil
Kannuneer thudachidume priyan
Prathibhalam nalkidume
Najan yuga yugam vanidume;- 4 Varangalal niranjum bhalangalal valarnum
Aruma manavalan varavinkal gami’chiduvan
Orukangal thika’chiduka ninte
Deepangal thelichiduka
Enna pathrangal niracheduka;- 5 Rathri kazhivarai pakalettam aduthu
Mathra-nerathinullil karthanu’mezhunnallarai
Veerare urangukayo seeyon yathrayil
Mayangukayo nam dheerarai gemi’chiduka;-

song.slide2:
Unarvarulka inneram deva
Aathma thejasinale mevan
Eyuganthya velayil vanil ninnu njangalil-1 Thavaka thumukathin darshanam daasaril nalkuka
Dhutha vrindam sadaram vazthidum aashishadayaka
Halleluya paduvan allel pade maruvan
Daya thonnename swarga thatha_...2 Aandukal aakave thernnidum aayathin munnamme
Nadha nin kaikalin velaye jeevippikename
Ninnathamvilakuvan nithyanadam neduvan
Krupa ekaneme swarga thatha_..3 Aadima snehavum jevanum thaygavum maanjupoyi
Daiva vishvasamo kevalam perinu mathrame
Vannalum ninnalaye thannalum jeevaviye
Thiru vagdathampol swarga thatha_..4 Kahalanadavum kelkuvan Aasannakalamai
Vanil nee vegathil shobikum aathma manalanai
Nin varavin lakshyangal engume kanunnitha
Orukidename swarga thatha_..

Purva pithakkalil pakarnna

Cheivaan najangale orukkename;-

Indalaku najaan vaazhumangu
Daivamund angu puthranunde
Aathmaavunde daivadootharunde1 Kudaramaaku en bhavanam
Vittakanal'enikkere bhagyam
Kaikalaal theerkatha mokshaveettil
Vegamaayi'tangu chennucherum;-2 Kartha'nesu thante pon karaththaal
Cherthidumaaya'thilenneyanu
Ottunaal kannuneer-pe'tathellaam
Pe‘tenu neengidume thi'ttamaayi;-3 Pokaamenikkente rakshakante
Rajyama'thinullil vaasam cheyaam
Rogam dukham peedayonumilla
Daham visappu-mangottumilla;-4 Ieevidhamaayulla veettinullil

Ennu najan chennagu cherumathil
Pinnede'nika-apathonumilla;-5 Nodinera'thekkulla laghusangkadam
Anavadhi thejasin bhagyam thanne
Kanninu kaanu-thonnumilla
Kanappeda'thoru bhaagyam thanne;-

Karuthiya karuthal ninachidumpol
Sthuthikuvan aayiram navu’poraye
Enkilum aavolam njan padi’sthuthikum;-

song.slide2:
1 Usha kaalam naam ezhunnelkkuga
Paranesuve sthuthippaan
Usha'kalam enthanantham nammal
Priyanodadutheedukil2 Ithu'poloru prahbatham namu-
Kkadutheedunnu maname
Ha! enthanantham nammal priyana
Sobha sooryanayai varunnaal3 Nannyallullan thudichidunnu
Thallayamesu karunnyam
Oaronnooaronnaai dhyanippaanithu
Nalla sandarba makunnu4 Innale bhuvil paarthi'runnava
Rethraperlogam vittu'poi
Eannalo namukkorunaal kude
Priyane paadi sthuthikkam5 Nagnanayi najan lokathil vannu
Nagnaanai thanne pokume
Logathilenikkilla yaathonnum
Ente koodannu pooruvan6 Ha! en priyante premathe oarthi-
Ttanandam paramanandam
Ha! en priyana puthu'vanabhoo
Dhanam cheiva'thenthanandam7 Maruvil ninnu priyanmel chari
Varunnorival aarupol
Vanathil koode pokunne najanum
Swantha rajjyathil chelluvan8 Kodongkattundee vanadesathen
Priyane! enne vidalle
Kothiyodu njan varunne
Ente sangadamangu theerkane;-

1 Uyarppin jeevanaal nithya jeevan nalkum
Karthavinodu koodeyen nithya vaasamaame2 Aven idam vittu sareerabethanai
Loke alanjaalum njaanen veedodakukkume3 Enn priyan parpidam manohara harmyam
Muthukalal nirmithamaam panthrandugopuram4 Kandanannichidaam nithyamaai vanidaam
En athmaavu vanchikkunnai njaan ennu cherumo5 En athma-vaasamo mal pithru'grahathil
Ponvathilkal viswaasa kankalkethra sobhitham6 Sudharin sobhanam avakaasamaam saalem
Prapippan aagrahathaal vaanchikkunne ennullam7 Enn allel theernnu njaan halleluia padum
Mannavanaamesuvinodu kude vanidum

song.slide2:
Uyarppin prabhathame ullathin premodame
Urvithannil bhakthanmark’ullaasain predeepameKristhurajan mruthwvejaichuyartha sudhiname
sathyam ie suvarthabhuvilevideyum sudhiname
marthyanee prethyasa thanna prarambha prabhathame
padum njan sangeethameshathrruvinte shakatiye thakartherinja divasame
mrithuvin balathinum viraamamitta nimishame
vijayabheri vishvamengum vinnilum muzhangiye
vritharin bheethi neengiye;-enthumarmmam naamellaarum nidrakollukillihe
anthyakaahalam dhvanikku madhipaneshuvaravathil
maranidra cheyum shudharu’yirkkumaksha-yaraay
theerum naam marurupamaay;-Ie dravathva’maya’tha’dravathvamaayi maarrume
Innu marthyamaya’thannu marthyathejasserrumemaranam
negi viravilangu vijayamayi marume
Vachanavum nirraverumeAlpakalam mruthw namme mannilazhthi vaikilum
marthya jeevithathinadhyamavide allorikalum
nithyamam en pranane pathalathil vidillavan
azhivu kanukilla njan;-Nam marichu nammal jeevan kristhuvodu koodave
daivathil maranjirikum ethra bhadramayathe
jeevanaya kristhu veendum thejassil velippedum
namu’mangu chernnidum;-

Uyarthidum njan ente kankal
Thunayarulum van giriyil
En sahayam vaanam bhoomi
Akilam vazhum yehovayil1 Israyelin kavalkaran nidra bharam thungunnilla
Yehovayen paalakan than illeniku kedha'mottum2 Sathru'bhayam neeki enne maathra thorum kaathidunnu
Neethiyin salpathakalil nithyavum nadathidunnu3 Sobha'yerum sworpuriyil theeramathil cherthidunnu
Sobhitha-purathin vaathil en mumpil njan kandidunnu4 Vanasena ganam padi vanidunnu sworga seeyon
Dhyanichidum neramente manasam modhichidunnu5 Hallelujah Hallelujah chernnidum najan sworga'dhese
Hallelujah paadi sarva kaalavum najan vaniduvan

song.slide2:
Vanchitham arulidum vaanavarkk adhipaa, nee
Vanniduka varam thanniduka
Thanchamadiyarkku nee yennarinjadiyangal
Anchidaathe param kenchidunne;-1 Mulppadarppinnu mel kelpodamarnnoru
Chilpporule, dayaa thalpparane
Darppamellaam neekki ulkkalaham pokki
Sathpadamadiyarkku kaattuka nee;-2 Aathmavishappu daaham ettamarulka deva
Thruptharaay adiyangal theernniduvaan
Sushmamam thirumozhi kettarinjathu vidham
Shudhiyaay jeevippaar aakename;-3 Ponnilum’akhilamee mannilum athuvidham
Vinnilum vilayerum nin vachanam
Innu dharichu njangal dhanyaraay theeruvaan
Mannavane, dayaa cheyyaname;-4 Mandamanassukalil unnatha balathodu
Chennidanam paraa nin vachanam
Nandiyod adiyangal ninne vanangaanarul
Cheyyaname krupa peyyaname;-5 Poovilum manamerum ponnilumoli chinnum
Thenilum madhurame nin vachanam
Raavilum pakalilum jeevanaay bhavichu mal
Bhaavi yanugraham aakaname;-

Vanna vazhikal onnorthidumbol
Innayolam nadathiya naatha
Nandiyallathillonnumilla
Ennum karuthalil vahichavaneBahu'duram munnottu pokan
Balam nalki nee nadathi
Thalarnnoro nerathilellam
Thava karangal aaswasamayiOodi marayum naalukal ellam
Orppikkunnu nin kaarunyam
Ooro jeevitha nimishangal ellam
Oothidunnu thava saanidyamMano’vyathakal nee ennum kandu
Mansalinju daya kaatti nee
Irulerum paathayilellam
Ithu vareyum thaangiyallo

song.slide2:
Vanneede’nam Yeshu nadha,
Innee yogamadhye’nee
Thannarulka nin varangal,
Nin sthuthi kondaduvan (2)Mannidathil vanna nadha,
Ponnu thirume’niye’,
Nanniyoditha nin dasar,
Vannu koodunne’ munbil (2)Thathane’krupa nithe’,
Sree ye’su namam moolame’,
Thannide’nam atma danam,
Prarthana cheitheduvan (2)Veda vakyangale’innu,
Modamo-dul-kolluvan,
Thathane’, thurakka ye’ngal;
Ullathethrukaikalal (2)Papamokke, ye’ttu chonnu,
Mochanam lebhicheedan,
Papa bodhame’ki inna-
Nugrahikka deivame’, (2)Innu nin thiru vachanam,
Ghoshikkum nin dasanum,
Ninnanugraha niravin
Sakthiyenalkeedenam (2)

song.slide2:
Vannidum Yeshu vannidum vegam mnnithil vannidume
Vallabhanyeshu unnatha Nathan vannidum megamathilMannavan varume prathibhalam tharume nishchayamai varume
Mannil’ninnuyarum bhathaganangal vinnil thannarikil chernnidume;-Lokam muzuvan bharam nadathan shokamakattiduvan
Yudain simham rajathirajan medinithannil vannidumeSarvasrishtiyumonnayinnu kathu njarangidunnu
Shapamakattan’aadamekan shalam rajan vannidumePashidahamellam parannakannidum than shudhabharanamathil
Parithilengum paramanadam niraum nalkal vannidumeVaram yeshurajan varanam salbharanam varanam
Vane thoru bhaktharil kanneranne theru vedanakal

Vanneduvin Yeshupadam chernniduvin
Papathe vittodeduvin

Varunareyum orunalum njan
Thallukayillenurachu Yeshu;- vannedu...1 Papathin shampalam maraname-athu ninne nashippikkume
Daivakrupayo kristhuvil nithya-jevananennu vishvasichitte;- 2 Innu’nee’marichalengupom daivakopam nengiyo
Ninakkayeshu kurishil marichuyir’thezhunnelli mahimayil;- 3 Maraname ninaya nerame athu ninne sanadhikkume
Marichor daiva’puthrante shabadam kettu jevikkum neramayallo;- 4 Itha njan vegam varunnuvennu Yeshurajan aruliyallo
Yeshuve’vegam meghathil vannu nithya’rajyathil cherrkka njangale;-

Ennu kaanum meghavanil
Konduvaran'onnumilla nada

Nanakalkethurayi vathiladanjaneram

song.slide2:
Varika Nal varangale Nee tharika
Aviye Subha karuna VapiyeThavajanabhishekathil
Sugandha thylame Divya
Snana thylame;- VarikaPravu polayo dahana
Jwala polayo Kathi-
rolivu polayo;- VarikaVazhka Manassin durvicharam
Ake Maruvan gunam
Eeri theruvan;- Varika
Papa kadalin Azham kanda
Papi njan ayyo… ennil
kopiyathayyo;- VarikaDosha’cheliyil muzhuki vazhum
Doshi njanallo guna-
doshi nee allo;- VarikaPrakruthi kondu Vikruthamaya
Hrudayam maruvan nava
Hrudayam Akuvan;- VarikaIrul Akannakom
Athunkal velivanayuvan
Veda thelivunaruvan;– VarikaSathya Dharma Neethi Marga
Murakal aakuvan krupa
Valare nalkuvan;- Varika

song.slide2:
Varika Suradhipa parama para Nin
Krunasanm vazhiyay sabhayil
Oru manasodu Nin thirubhavane
Parichodadiyar varunnathu kan;- VarikaBhakthiyodadiyar Nin thruppathathil
Prarthana chaithu varam lebhippan
Nithyavum Nin parisudhatma
Sakthi thannarulan bhajichidumpol;- VarikaThirumanasine kurichoru manasai
Iruvaro moovaro varunnidathil
Karunayode ezhunnarulumennu
Thiruvacha aruliya Parama Sutha;- VarikaVannadiyarude kanmashavum
Thinmayaseshavum durmanassum
Onnodasheshavum neekkidenam
Ennum mokshe adiyar nilpan; - VarikaDootharude sthuthiyil vasikkum
Neethi swaroopanam Yehovaykum
Bhoothala rakshaka Mashihaykum
Parisudhatmavinum sthothram;- Varika

Durithangalakhilam theerthiduvaan
1 Lokathil thingum kleshangalakatti
Meghathilenne cherthidum orunaal
Akamathilathinaal sangeetham paadi

song.slide2:
1 Varunnu paramesan ipparil
Bharanam bharamelkan
Varavinnai than vachanam pol nee
Orungeedonnuvo?;-2 Muzhangum kahala dwoniyum parichil
Pathinairamam dhuthanmarum
Aairamaayiram visuthanmarum
Aayittayira’maandu vaanidaan;-3 Ulakin shrishtikal deva’sutharin
Thejasakum swathndriyamode
Dreva’thwathin dhas’yathil ninnudane
Viduthal prapich’aanandha’madavaan;-4 Mudandhan maanine pole chadum
Umanmarum ullasicharkum
Kurudanmarude kannu thurakum
Ozhiyum manusha sapa’masesham;-5 Simham kaalapol pullu thinnedum
Pullipuliyum gokalu’mathupol
Sarppathin pothil kalichedum
Cheriya shisukalum yeshuvin rajye;_6 Vazhipokkar verum bhoshanmar polum
Vazhi thettathe nadannidum annu
Ithu than ninnude vazhi’ennulloru
Mozhiyum pinnil kelkamenne;-7 Varumorovidha parishodhanayil
Sthiramai vijayam prapichavare
Para’neshuvin thiru simhasanathil
Orumichang ‘iruthiduvanai;-8 Snehathal niranjoru samrajyam
Snehathin sworupanam yeshu
Modhathal niranjoru vishudhar
kaayittayira’maandu nalkeedan;-

Varunnude varunnude
Ente athbhutham varunnudeKurudanu kaazhcha labhichathupol
En saukhyam varunnudeEliyaavinappam labhichchathupol
En aahaaram varunnudeAbrahaam anugraha’maayathupol
En anu’graham varu’nnudeYoseph maani’kka’ppe’ttathupol
En uyarcha varunnudeDaaniyel vidu’vikkappetta’thupol
En viduthal varu’nnude;-Daaveedu yuddham jayi’chathupol
En vijayam varunnude;-Salomon vijnjaanam labhi’chathupol
En vijnjaanam varunnude;-

song.slide2:
Varuveen iee nalla samayam vruthavakathe
ninne yeshu vilichidunnu (2)1 Vazhvin nalellam vin’nalai
Bharathode nee kazhickukayo
Vannudan paadam thedidukil
Vinnathil ninne cherthidume;-2 Kettiya veedum nilam porulum
Kandidum uttor udayavarum
Kudu vittu nin jeevan poyal
Kude’varathe verpedume;-3 Ulakam maya azhakum samam
Athu nampathe mayakum ninne
Maranam’orunaal vannidume
Marakathe nin rekshakane;-4 Vaanathin keezhe bhumi methe
Vanavan’yeshu naamamenniye
Rekshippan margam vere illa
Rekshakan yeshu than vazhiye;-5 Theeratha papam vyathiyeyum
Maratha ella belaheenavum
Ghora kurisil chumannu ninne
Saukyamaki than adippinaral;-6 Sathya vachanam kettu nee vaa
Nithya jeevan ninakkee’kidume
Nin perum jeeva pusthakathil
Unmayai innu ezhuthiedume;-

song.slide2:
Varuveen yeshuvin arikil
Ethra nallavan than ruchicharikil
Varuveen krupakal pozhiyum Kurisinnarikil;-1 Krupamel krupayarnniduvan
Nammal parama padham chernniduvan
Dharayil nadanna than charanam
Ningalkarulum sashwatha’sharanam
Allum pakalum munpil nilppavan thunayai;-2 Parisodhanakal varikil
Manam patharasraichidukil
Belaheenathayil kaviyum
Krupa mathi’yennasraichidukil
Viravil vinakal therum sakalavum subhamai;-3 Snehitharevarum vedinjal
Athu yeshu’vinodu nee paranjal
Snehitharilla kurisil
Petta padukalezhum than karathal
Nannai’nadathum veetil cherum’vareyum;-4 Orunal naswara lokam
Vittu piriyum namathi vegam
Ange karayil’ninnum
Nam nediya’thendannariyum
Lokam veruthor vila namann’alariyum;-

Vayalu-vilayana-kazcha kandem
Kannu kulirumpol
Njan vachanamorkunnu daiva vachanamorkunnu (2)Koyithinte nalkalenkil vayalu nirayunnu
Swarna kathiru-kayikunnu
Veyilum mazhayum ettu kathiru vadunnu
Valiya vyalu padunnuSuvishesha vela-cheyan va…
Nalla yajamante seva cheyyan va..
Sthanamana-kudu vittu va…
Nalla shihyanai krushumenti va..Divarajaym… kadukumani pole

Neeyum alasanakalle

Ninte kanaku theer-thidumeSuviseha vela-cheyan va…
Nalla yajamante seva cheyyan va..
Sthanamana-kudu vittu va…
Nalla shihyanai krushumenti va..Koyithinay vayalere undenkilum
Thozha velakaro churukam
Tholodu tholchernnu pokam nam orumichu
Yajamanan varuvan kalamayi
Nalla yajamanan varuvan kalamayihey..Chadu chadu chadu chadu chadu chadu uyarum
Kahalanadam kettille kettile
Kettille kettille kelkunnille

song.slide2:
Vaazhthin vaazhthin Yeshu
Rakshakane vazhthin
Paadin thante albhutha snehathe
Arthidunnu mahatva daiva doodanmar
Keerthippin than vishudha namathe
Than makkale idayanpole kaakkum
Than kaikalil vahikkunnu sadaa;-Vazhthin vazhthin karthan ma
Mahavtvam vaazhthin
Keerthippin than visudha namatheVazthin vazhthin Yesu rakshakane vaazhthin
Paapikalkkai paadettu marichu
Karthan paara nithya rakshayin rathyasa
Kruseriya yesuve vazhthidin
Klesamellaam sahichathorthu sthothram
Cheiveen thante albhutha snehavum;-Vazhithin vazhthin Yeshu rakshakane vazhthin
Vaanor vazhthin
Hosanna paaduvin
Vazhunneshu rakshakanennumennekkum
Vazhikka purohitha raajanai
Lokatheyum jayichu varunnesu
Maanam sakthi karthanullathallo;-

Nithyam thante karunniyam sathiyam thante vagdathamThan vishudha vachanam Andhathayil velicham

Vazhum najanen rakshi’thaavin koodeyeppozhum
Than krupayil aasrayikkum ella nalum najaan
Padum naja’ennum ente priyanae1 Ente priyen vaanil ninne’ezhunnealleedunna
Maattoli najan kettidunnu nattilengume
Kshamam bhukambam athinarambam;-2 Kshaama’thalli-kshoni engum ksheena-makumbol
Enikkethi-daatha nikshepa-mundente priyanil
Enne pottidum ente rakshakan;- 3 Innale-kkalinnu najanen priyen nadino-
Dettam aduthaayathe’nikke ethra anendham
Ente priyane onnu kaanuvan;-4 Eee varidhiyil van thirayin thallalettu najaan
Mungidathe priyanente bottil-undallo
Gaanam padi en nattilethume;-5 En rakshithaave nin-varavu kaathu kaathu najaan
Eee dhustaloke kashtathakal ethra elkanam
Ninne kanumbol en dhukkam theernnupom;-

song.slide2:
Vazthiduka sthuthi'charthiduka
Avante namam uyarthiduka 1 Pachapul medukalil dhinavum
Palippathorthal engane nam
Palakanesuve marannirikum
Than daya onnai goshichidam;-2 Iesana’mulan adichuyarnnu
Padaku thakarnnennu thonniyappol
Nodiyil jayam thanna rekshakante
Palanam orthu nam sthuthichiduka;-3 Innenne bharathal jerangiyappol
Onnum bhayapede’ndannura cheyithille
Kakkayal bhakthane pottiya nathante
Snehathe orthu nam sthuthi’chiduka;-4 Kashtathin kottayil akapettapol
Appuram kadannidan pazhuthillathe
Akathum purathum peedanam vannappol
Rekshicha nathane sthuthichiduka;-

song.slide2:
Vazthidume vazthidume emmanuvele
En jeevakale ie kshonithale1 Duthar sthuthikum nakavallabhan pirannu goshalayil
Bendha’mazhichu andanenneyum bendhuvakiyathal
Innum ennum nannai sthuthikum
Nathan yeshuve njaan iee dharayil;-2 Papakadalil shapakuzhiyil pidanju neentheedave
Papamakatti shapam neeki marvilanachavane
Kashtam nashtam sarvam ettu nin
Pinpe nin dhasar nadannidame;-3 Shathru thannude agnisharangal thoduthu vittedukil
Ninnayudhangal kathidumenne ponnu nayakane
Reksha sathyam neethi charthi nee
Shakthanakidum sena nayaka!;-4 Vanamukilil dhootha sangamai nathan varumalavil
Lokam virakum lokar bhramikum najan’annarthidume
Noki noki kankal mangunne
Eppol vannidum en pranapriya;-

1 Vaazthi pukazhthumenneshu naathane
veenu namaskarichadiyan
nithyajeevan thannu daivaputhranakkitheertha
snehamorthu njaanJeevanaathaneshuve enjeevakaalam vaazhthum njaan
halleluyya geetham ennum paadi sthuthichidum njaan2 paapam niranjullathaakum paathayil
njaanalanjulanju pokave
thedivannuvanne nedi jeevamaarge
chertha nallidayan thaan;-3 chatha naaya samamaayorenneyum
raktham chinthi veendeduthathaal
chitham nandiyaal niranju thruppadathil veenu
mutham cheyyum njaan;-4 nithyashikshavidhi neengi poornnamaam
prathyaashayilaayen jeevitham
kristhu naayakinilaaya naal mathul haa ethrra
dhanyanaayi njaan;-5 innu paaril paradeshiyaayi njaan
paarkkumen rakshakan sakshiyaay

song.slide2:
Vazthi sthuthi’kumennum najan
Ente thazchail’ortha iesane1 Varnnichidan enikente navu poraye
Enni theerthidamo avan cheithathu
Aairamai sthuthichidunne
Aananna hasthangale uyarthi;-2 Papa sapa rogam’ayathente bheethiyal
Nasa garthathil pathikum nerathil
Sneha hastham neettiyenne
Nin thiru rajyathil akkiyallo;-3 Chettilallayo kidannathorthu nokiyal
Nattamallayo vamichathen jeevitham
Mattiyallo en jeevithathe
Mattamillatha ninte krupayal;-4 Papikale thedivanna yeshu rekshakan
Papamilla sutharkaitha varunne
Varavin dhinam athisamepam
Varavin prethyasayal niranjidame;-5 Allal thingum jeevithathil najan vasichappol
Vallabha! nin snehamennil uttiyallo
Jaya geetham paadiduvan nin jayam
Nee enikekiyallo;-

1 Vazhthidum njanente rekshakaneinnum
sthothram cheyum thante van krupakai2 Shathruvin sallyangalesathe enneyee
aazhcha muzhuvanum kathathinal3 Veezhchakalesathe sukshichathorthinnu

1 Vazthidunneshu namam
Sthuthi’chidunneshu naamam
Sworga’menikumethe thurannidumpol
Sthothra’geetha yagam najan arppikunneshuvinu
Aa divya’dharsanam najan kandidumpol2 Manushyaril aasrayam orikalum vekuvan
Ida varutharuthe ennasritha valsala
Kaakane ninte paathayil
Ente jeevitha kaalamellam;-3 Anukoolamai enikarum ie ulakil
Aduthum ennakaleyum yeshuve nee thanne
Charum ninte maarvil
Ente jeevitha kaalam’ellam;-4 Prathikula naduvil anudhinam’arikil
Manassandhi arulum parama rekshakane
Vazhthum ninne paadum
Ente jeevitha kaalam’ellam;-

song.slide2:
Vazthidunnu vazthidunnu vazthidunnu njan
En rekshakane nanniyode vazthidunnu njanMattin thozhuthil piranna mannya suthane!
Heena vesham’edutha ninne vazhthidunnu njanVeshathil manushynai kanapettone
Manushya’jenmam eduth nine vazthidunu njanPathakarkai neethivazhi othi thannone!
Paridathil ninne orthu vazhthidunnu njanGathasamane sishyarumai prarthichavane
Rekthavum viyarthavane vazhthidunnu njanKurisheduthu malamukalil nadannu poyone
Thrippadham randum chumbichippol vazhthidunnu njan Kurisilirumpanikalal tharakapettone
Ezhumozhi chonnavane vazhthidunnu njanKurishileri marichuyarthu sworge poyone!
Nithyam jeevikunnavane vazhthidunnu njan Dhutharumai mekhavahane varunnone
Vegam ninne kanmathinai kathidunnu njan Ennu’mekhe vannu kanum rekshakane njan
Noki noki kathidunne nin varavinai Nin’varavin munnaniyi ninnidane njan
Vazthi vazthi ninnidume nin varavil njan

song.slide2:
Vazhthunne ennesu rajane-sarvakalavum
Keerthikunnu vankrupakalorthu nanniyai-
vazhthunne ennsu rajane;-1 En papam peri vankrusileri
En shapam theerthu nee nin shapa mruthuval
enne veendedutha sneha deepame-daiva
sneha deepame
swondamakiya nin snehamorthu
jan padum jeeva nalellam;-2 Sworgeeyanode enneinakayum
nin jeevan moolamai than puthranakiyum
neeyen njanam neethi suthiyum-divya samadhanavum
veende’duppumaya’thorthu nanniyai
sthuthi padum nanniyai;-3 Maruvasamakave aaswasamethume
kanathuzhannu jan param thalarnnitha
kutukarumillaswasamai-enikillaswasamai
karthanesuvin sakithamulla jan
Endhu paril ksheenippan;-4 Ennullamakave priyanodu cheruvan
kothichidunnathikamai ponmugam kanuvan
ennen kannuneera’kannu vazhum jan
vinnilangu vazhum njan-aa sworgeeya’dhinam
ennu kanum njan-natha- ennu kanum njan;-5 Parisothanakale tharanam cheithakare
parisuthanadhike parichodu cheruvan
shuthamaka rekthathalenne sudha- rekthathalenne
sithanakidukalmavinalenne- divya-almavinalenne;-6 Nin sannithanathil sandoshamen belam
nin mugakandiyal ennum nithyanandam
ha en priyan kude chernnu vazhum jan
angu chernnu vazhu jan
aa daiva mahatha naladuthitha daiva’ naladuthitha;-

1 Veendedukappetta koottame
vegamunarnnu rekshakante vela cheyuveen
Anthyakalam vannaduthe pentacostin velayane
Chandhamode seva cheithal swontha’nattil poidame;-2 Abraham issahak yakobe enna visuthar
ethranalai parthalm vittu
kathu kathu ninnidunna sodara nee orthiduka
purthiyai nin vela’theerthu
parthalam vedinju’pokam;-3 Unnatha viliku yogyare vilichavante
sanninthiyil ninnu maralle
mannidathil ninne orthu unnatham vedinju vanna
nannanante vannya paadham
ennum onnai vannichidam;-4 Ie loka rajyam asthamikarai
Aa loka rajyam vegamitha aagamikarai
Papamilla parisuthan paridathil vannu thante
Pavanamai jeevikunna paavanare cherthidume;-5 Alppakalam mathrameyullu nam
Ethravegam krithyamai vela theerthidam
ethranal labhichidumo athranalum rekshakante
puthrathwathin almavale
shakthiyai than’vela therkam;-

song.slide2:
Verum kaiyai njaan chellumo,
Rakshakan sannidhiyil
Otta nalin se’va polum,
Kazchave’kkathe’ munbil?Verum kaiyai njaan chellumo,
Rakshakan munbil nilpaan,
Oru dehi polum illa(thu),
Engine vanangum njaan.Rakshakan, veende’duthathaal,
Mruthyuve bhayamilla,
Ve’rum kaiyai thanne’ kanman,
Unde’nikke’ttam bhayam;-Paapam cheithu naal kazhicha(thu),
Udharicheedamenkil
Rakshakan paadhathil kazhcha
Vechupayogicheedaam;-Shuddhare vega’munarnnu

Aatma’nettam cheitheedin;-

song.slide2:
Vishrama naattil njan ethiedumpol
Yeshuvin maarvil njan aanandhikkumParama’sughangalin namrutha’rasam
Paramesan maarvil njan paanam cheyyumParama pithaavente kannil ninnu
Karachilin thullikal thudacheedumeShathrukkalaaru mannavideyilla
Karthaavin kunjungal maathramathilKunjaattin Kaanthayaam sathya sabha
Sounarya poornayai vaazhunnathilParishdhathmavinte palumku nadhi
Samrudhiyai Ozhukunna dhesamathuJeevante vriksha mundaattarikil
Maasamthrorum kittum puthiya phalamNava retna’nirmmitha pattanathil
Shobhitha sooryanai Yeshu’thanneParama sugham tharu-nnuravakalil
Paranodu koode njaan vaazhum nithyam

song.slide2:
Vishudhaalmaave! varika dhoshiyaam
en nenchil vassikka!Nin hitham ethra a-rinjaalum paapame
nitham cheitheedunnu njaan - enmel
nee kadaakshikkenam - allenkil paapi njaan
Nithya chaavinnirayaam;- Vishu…Paapiyente moolam - paadupetten Yeshu
Paaril marichathine – pala
Pravassiam paapi ma-rannu maa papa
Pakshamaai cheithupoyen;- Vishu…Jeevannundennuru - naamame ullennil
Jeevamille parane! – bhavaan
Kaivittal paapi njaan – chaavinitayaame
Kopichu pokaruthe;- Vishu…Ninnotapekshichu - vandhanam cheivaanum
Nin sathyam kelppathinnum – mandham
Ennil palappozhum - vannavekku kshema
Thannu nee vanneetuka;- Vishu…Ie loka maayayil - kaalam kazhichu njaan
mel tokathe marannen – ini
aalokakkaryangal chinthippathinnu nee
aagraham thannetuka;- Vishu…Kallupolulla en-vallatha nenchine
nallavannam ilakki – ulla
vallaatha chinthakal – neekki ennullil nee
palli kondeetename;- Vishu…

song.slide2:
1 Vishudhiye thikachu nam orungi nilka
Priyan varuvathin thamasamereilla-thante
Vagdathangal palathum niraverunne-orungeedam 2 Yuthangal kshamangal bhukampam-pala
Vyathikalal jenam nasichidunne- rajyam
Rajyangalodethirthu thudangiyallo-orungeedam;- 3 Kottarangal thudangi kottil vare-jenam
Kannuneer thazhvarayilallayo-oru
Swosthathayumilla manushyarkihe – orungeedam;-4 Aakasathin sakthi ilakunnathal- bhoovil
Enthu bhavikumennorthukonde-jenam
Pedichu nirjeevaraidunne-orungeedam;-5 Buthimanmar palar veenidunne-daiva
Shakthi thejichavarodidunne-loka
Mohangalkathinarai theerunnathal – orungeedam;- 6 Megarudanai vannidume- pathi-
nairam perilum sunnaran than-thante
komala’rupam kandanannippan-orungeedam;-7 Malinnya pettidathodiduka manavalan
Varavettam aduthu poi maniyarayil
Poi’nam aaswasippan – orungeedam;-

song.slide2:
Vishvasa jeevitha padakil njan
Seeyon nagariyil pokunnu njan
Viswasa nayakan yesuve nokki
Visrama desathu pokunnu njanAlakal padekil adichennaal
Allaloralpavum illenikke
Aazhiyum oozhiyum nirmicha-naadhan
Abhaya maayennarikilundeMarana nizhalil thazhvarayil
Sharanamayenikesuvunde
Karalalinju en kaikal pidichu
Kruthi nadathum andyam vare;-Naana pareekshakal vedhanankal
Nannaayenikkinnudaayidilum
Naadhanaeyum ullhil dhyaanichu en
Ksheenham marhannangu pokunnu-njanVinnhilen veetil njaan chennucherum
Kannhuneerokkeyum annu theerum
Ennhiyaal theeraatha thankrhupakal
Varhnnichu paathathil veenhidum-njan

song.slide2:
Vishvaasa jeevitha yaathrayathil
Kashtam prayaasangal earitumpol
Vishvaasa naayakan Yeshu maheshane
Thrukkaram neetti nee thangi natathukaEn pearkkaai krooshathil thoongiyallo
Kaal karam aanikkaai eakiyallo
Enthu njaan thanneetumo naadhaa ninakkaai
Eatukolka enney muttum sampoornamaaiRogathaal deham kshayichennaalum
Aashwaasam nalkunnon koote unte
Aanippazhuthulla pon karan neetti thaan
Thaangi natathitum anthyam vareyennePaazhmaru bhoomiyil paathayorukkuvaan
Paalakan nee ennum kooteyunte
Paarithil ente vaasam kazhiyumpol
Vishramam praapikkum nin maarvil nithyamaaiVittu pirinjavar Karthanotothe
Aarthu santhoshikkum aa samoohe
Naamum aa koottathil chearnnituvaanaai
Anyam ennennaam ee loka sukhangaleDhuthanmaar kaahalam oothitumpol
Aakaasha meghathil thaan varumpol
Doore aa shobhitha theerathananju naam
Vaataa kireetangal chootitum nischayam

Loakamam varidhiyil;
Shobanamam nitya’geham-noki
Oottam odunnu (2)Aakamshayayi oodunnu njan

Alma’manalanam yeshuve kanum-njan
Annu theerum en klesham (2)Kurirul mudi varumpol
Sathanya shodanakal;
Bhekaramy vannennalum
Bharamay kakum karthen (2)Thejassil vasam cheythedum

A anal athasanname (2)Kantanay yeshu maheshan

Kanthayay njanum cherum (2)Purna jayam prapichoram
Kandayam shudar ganam;
Shalemin rajanin kude
Vazum nityam thejassil (2)

song.slide2:
Vishvasamode ningal aswadihu-chukolvine
Nnesu paranaruli aasu murichappan than
Nalki shishiarkkaayi-mozhi eki
Chaiveen ningalithannor – makkayi;-Mannan Yesumahesan manusharkkai chora
Chinni maricha thine chintha chaika than sabha
Koodi modhamodee-suthuthi paadi nandhi-
yodee salkarmam kondadi;-Swargapurathineka-margamallo Kristhu
Swarga appam bhujichu-Swarga veenju kudichu
Jeevan nithyajeevan-athu yavan
Ichikkunnu sampadhikkumavan;-Jeevabeli kodutha jeevanayakanesu
Jeevan vedijnathu nin-Jeevannennorthu swarga
Bhojiam Krishturajiam-athu thyajiam
Ennennaikil nintetham aa Rajaim;-Nurukki Krusumarathil-Murichu Krishtha’shareeram
Arinju nee bhujicheedil-Nirayume ninnil jeevan
Sathyam jeevan nithyam allaikil mrithiu
Vannu veettume nin nasam krithiam;-

song.slide2:
Vishvaasathaal njaan krooshin paathayil
Yeshuvinte koode yaathra cheykayaam
Shaashwatha naattilen vaagdatha veettil njaan
Aashwaasa geetham paadi pokayaam;-Sthothrangal geethangal paadi modamaay
Mokshayaathra pokunnu krooshin paathayil
Aakulamerilum bheeruvaay theeraathe
Swantha veettil pokayaamKaarirul moodum ghoravelayil
Kaathukollumenne karthan bhandramaay
Ksheenithanaayi njaan theerilum maaraathe
Paaniyaal thaangum nalla naayakan;-Bhauthika chinthaa bhaaramaakave
Vittu nithyajeeva paathe pokum njaan
Impamaanenkilum thumbamaanenkilum
Yeshuvil chaari yaathra cheyyum njaan;-Ie lokasaukhyam venda thellume
Vittuponnathonnum thedukillamel
Kristhuvin nindayen divya nikshepamaay
Enni njaan seeyon yaathra cheythidum;-Swarloka naattilethi njaanente
Priyanothu vaazhum kaalamorkkumbol
Innezhum dukhangalalppa naal maathramaa-
nennaalum pinne impabhaagyanal;-

song.slide2:
Vishvasathil ennum munnerum njaan
Vishvasathal ellam cheithidum njaan
Onnum asadhyamaai illente
Munpilini jayam enikunde
Njanottum pinmaruka illa
Vishvasa chuvadukal munnotte munnotte
Aarellam ethirthalum enthellam bhavichalum
Pinmarukillini njanAthikarathode ini kalppikum njan
Prethikoolangal maaripokum
Onnum asathyamai illente munpilini
Jayam enikunduAnartham undennu njan bhayappedilla
Tholvi varumennu njan bhayappedilla
Shathru jaikumenno bhavi nashikumenno
Ini mel jan bhayappedilla;- Rogathino ini sapathino
Papathino jan atheenalla
Sathannya sakthiyinmel sapa’bendhanathinumel
Jayam enikundu;-Aakula chindhayal nirayuka’illa
Bharangalorthini karayuka illa
Thaka samayatheni’kellam
Orukunnavan orikalum kai vidilla;-

song.slide2:
Vishwasikale vaa, Thushta maanasarai
Vanniduka vaa ningal Bethlahemil
Vaa, vannu kaanmin, ThrivishtaparaajanHaa vegam vannu padi,
Haa vegam vannu vazhthin
Vaa vegam Vannu Vaazhthin, KarttaveDevadi ma devan, Sree yesu karthaavu
Ee loke vannudichu kanyayil
Rajaadhi raajan srushtialla jaathan;- Ha vegam... Malahamarodu melam koodi paadin
Swarloka nivasikale paadin
Mahonnathathil daivathinu sthothram;- Ha vegam...Iee bhoomiyil jaathan, prabha yerum raajan
Ieeso thampuranu sthothram paadin
Parilullore vannanam karettin;- Ha vegam...

song.slide2:
Vishvasikale vishvasikale
Uyarthiduvin jayathin kodikal
Ekalam ekalam dwonippan kalamai
Mal priyan varunnu – malpriyan varunnu;-Niranniduveen niranniduveen
Por veerarai nam sutheerarai nam
Dharippin dharippin sarvayutha vargam
Almavil dharippin – almavil dharippin;-Sathyam kettuvin sathyam kettuvin
Aracku kettuveen kavacham dharippin
Rekshayam rekshayam sirasthram dharippin
Almavil dharippeen – almavil dharippeen;-Samathanamam samathanamam
Suvisesham dharippeen kalinu dharippin
Ellattinum meethe thee ampe keduppeen
Thee ampe keduppeen – thee ampe keduppeen;-Porattamullathe porattamullathe
Ie lokarodalla jedeekarodalla
Sworloka sworloka dhushtalma senayil
Dhushtalma senayil – dhushtalma senayil;-Kshenam theernnupom Kshenam theernnupom
Kshenangal theernnu pom malpriyan varumpol
Aanannam aanannam nithyanannamunde
Jayam namukunde - jayam namukunde;-

song.slide2:
1 Vithacheeduka nam swargathinte vitham
Kristhan suvishesham hridayangalil
athma mari peiyyum daivam krupa cheiyum
tharum koithineyum thakka kalathil;-Koithu kalathil-nam santhoshichum
Kattakal chumannu-konduvannidum2 Vithavheeduka nam-snehathin adhvanam
orunalum vyartham alla akayal
ennum prarthicheedin velayil ninnedin
vithu nanacheedin kannunnerinal;-3 Vithacheeduka nam-vardhanaye daivam
Nalkum sarvaneram than’van’shakthiyal
Venalkkalam varsham-kattu sheetham ushnam
Cheiyyum daiva ishtam-bhoomi nilkum nal;-4 Vithacheeduka nam-thadassam anekam
Sathan kondennalum- than vyragyathil
Thalarnnu pokathe-snehavum vidathe
Nilka ksheenikkathe-krishthan shakthiyil;-5 Vithacheeduka nam-vithakkunna kalam
Avasanicheedum ethra vegathil
Ippol vithakkathe-irrunnal koiyyathe
Rakshakan munbake, nilkkun lajjayil;-6 Vithacheeduka nam-divya samadhanam
Mulacheeduvolam shoonnya deshathil
Marubhoomi kadum, uthsavam kondadum
Parvathangal padum deiva thejasil;-

Vittu pokunnu njan iee desham
Anya'nay paradesiyay paartha desham
Swantha naattil, swantha veettil
Nitya Kaalam vaaniduvaanEnte aayusu muzhuvan
Enne kaathallo Daivame
Onnum Cheythilla njan iee bhoovil
Ninte nanmakalkothathu polKarthavil marikkunna marthyar
Bagyavanmaravar nischayam
Chennu cherum vegamavar
Swarga seon puriyilEnte desam santhosha desam
Dukham venda priya janame
Veendum kaanum vegam nammal
Karthan vaanil ethumbol

song.slide2:
Yah enna shakthanam daivamallo ennum
Israyelin rekshakan
Avan enne snehichu kurishathil marippan
Sworgam vittirangiyallo
En Yeshuve! Ninte naamame
En aalmavin aadharame
Athen naavinethra maathuryameNjan ninne saukyamakunnonennu
Swondha jenathinaruliyavan
Adippinarukalal saukyam nalkidunnon
Enikum nal vaidyanathre;-Koorirul thazhvare nadannidilum
Dhosham ethume bhavikayilla
Samruthiyai jeevane nalkidunnonente
Nallidayan ennume;-Nammude daivam samathaname
Avan saswatha samathaname
Lokam nalkatha samathanam ekume
Avan ente samathaname;-Sakalavum nanmakai cheyunnavan
Ellam enikai karutheettunde
Sampannanam avan sannithi mathiyee
Nikavan jayakodiye;-

Ennumente paalakan
Illenikku khedha-monnume (2)1 Pachayaaya pulpurhanghalhil

Kshaemamai pottunnenneyum

Nanmayum karhunayokkeyum

song.slide2:
Yahe nee en daivam vazhthum njan ninne
Sthuthyarhame thava namam1 Aazhi-yennorthilla aazhamaranjilla
Alakalkum njan thellum bhayappettilla
Irangi njan priyane! Samudrathin naduvil
Nin vili kettu pin varuvan 2 Alarunnee azhiyil alayathi koram
Thonnunnu bheethiyen hrithiparam
Padhangal aazhathil thazhunnu priyane
Endhuka thikaram-athinal3 Ennilum bhakthar ennilum sakthar
Veenu thakarnnee-porkalathil
Kanunnu njan asthi-koodangal bheekaram
Veera poomankalil veenavaril4 Arppanam cheyunnalma-niyogathal
Alppam enikingullath ellam
Unnathane thava-sevayil jeevitham
Onnumathi enikulakil5 Ieyiha shakthikalakilaum bhakthanu
Vipareetham nee ariyunne
Thanguka karathal kakkuka balathal
Swargaseeyon purivareeyum

song.slide2:
Yahee neeyenne ennum shodhana chytheedunnu
Njaan irikunnathum ezhu’nelkunnathum neeyariyunne
Ente nirupanam dhurathu ninnu nee grahicheedunnu(2)
Ente nadappum kidappum nee shodhana cheyunnu (2)Ente vazhikaleyellam nadha neeyariyunnu
Neeyariyathe vakukalonnum navinmelilla
Munpum pinpum adachum nin kai enmel vachedunnu
Nin parijanam ennum enke athbuthamakunnu;-Ninte aathma’vineyolichu njanvede pokum
Thirusannidi vittevideku njanodi poyidum
Njaan swargathil kayariyal nee avideyumndello
Pathalathil kidaka virichal avideyum neeynde;-Njane chirku dharichu samudrathinappuram poyeedam
Ninte valamkayi enne nityam pidichu nadathunnu
Iruttu’polum nada ninku maravakunnilla
Rathri pakalpol nin thirumunpil shobicheedunnu;-Neeyen’natharamgaleyellam nirmmichavanallo
En mathavin udarathil neeyenne medanjallo
Ninte pravarthikal’nnennekum athbutha’mayathinal
Njan ninkennum rappkal’lorupol sthothram cheytheedume;-

Yahe ninte naamam vaazthidunnu
Yahe ninte naamam pukazthidunnu
Samgethathodum sthothrathodum
Ninte naamam vazthidunnu
Ninte naamam vazthidunnu(2)Ninte mahathwam aakasham varnni’cheedumpol
Ninte krupakal bhulokam vazthedumpol
Rakshkanam nin sannidiyil njagal vanagidunnu
Palakanam nin savidhe njagal namichidunnu;-Rogangal sahichu njan valagidumpol
Dhurithangal ente dehi thakarthidumpol
Rakshakanay nee karam pidichenne uyarthidunnu
Abhayameki nee arikil enne anachidunnu;-

song.slide2:
1 Yahve sthuthippinavan shutamam mandirathil
Aahvan chithu nuthi goshsippin
Vihaya savithana’bhangi pariganichu
Maheswra’sthuthikal cheitheedin;-2 Thullyamillatha thante verya’pravarthi vazhti
Bhulokamengum podi pareedin
Kallola’maliyodu solla’samebhuvanam
Thulli’kalichee-marennalum;-3 Nissimamaya thante thejassinothavannam
Sal’sevithanu sthuthi padeedidn
Susravyamaya velli’kkahala’doniyodu
Shaswathanayakne vandippin;-4 Ponmayama veenakampikal meeti yahin
Karma’mahimayengum ghoshippin
Nirmala’bhakthiyodu-thanne vanageeduvin
Dharma’swarupa’bhangi kanippin;-5 Styeswarnu munpil nirtham thudangiduvin
Thappodu kinnarngal vayippin
Kaithala’nadambre shaktya muzangidatte
Satan nadungidatte hosanna;-6 Sarveswarante krupa’uryamanubhavikum
Garvamakanna jeevi’samkatham
Sarvamavannu jayam padatte halelluyah
Durvara’ghoshamuyarnnidatte;-

song.slide2:
Yahen daivamen aashrayame!
Ente sangetham nee mathrame
Nin pathaye nokki nokki munpo’todum’antyam’vareyum.Ente jeevitha nalukalil prana’nayaken kudeyunde
Bhayam vendihe marubhuvathil prana’nayaken kudeyundeEn papabharam chumannu kurisheri kaalvari mettil
En perkay jeevan thannone
Ninte sneham entha'ashchryame
Dinamokeyum ninne sevippan ninte vankrupa nalkidane;-Shathru'nira'nirayay nilkunne ninda parihasam eeridunne
Prathikulangaleridunne nadha nin marvil charidunne
Shakthi nalkenam jayam nalkenam
Swarga seeyonilethum vare;-Yeshu manavalen vannidaray
Thante kandaye cherthiduvan
Ini kalangalereyilla thante vagdatham niraverunne
Ennu vannidum mukam kanuvan
Priya ennu nee vannedumo;-

Pacha-pulpurathenne kidathunnavan

Avanavakaasamaam jenam naam

Yahova ente idayanallo
Enikonninum muttundakayilla
Pachayaya pulpurangal thorum
Mechamay pottunna idayanIdayan idayan nalla idayan
Enkettam adutha udayon
Ente yeshu nalla idayanSawsthamaya vellathinarike

Neethi’pathayil nadathidunnuKurirul thazvarayil nadannal

Avane sharamam prapikunna manushyan bhagyavan

Nee mathram mathi-yenike
Yehaova rafa… saukya dayakan
Than adipinaral saukyam
Yehova samma koode irikum

Enneyennum vazi nadathum

Yehova elshaddayi sarva shakthanam
Jayaveeranai kudeunde;-

song.slide2:
Yehovavku sthothram cheyitheduka nam
Mahonnatha devane vazthuka nam1 Than daya ennekum’ullathallo
Van krupa’thannu nadathunnalo
Bhaktha’ravan krupayikottathupol
Nityaum sthuthi padidatte;-2 Marthaya’nilasrayi’kunnathekal
Kartha’nilasrayikunnavan than
Dhanya’nennau-mipparidathil
Vandy bhujangalal thangumavan;-3 Snehathin shasanakal varumpol
Baharngal hrittine mudidumpol
Karunymerum pon karathal
Thangi nadathidum van’krupayal;-4 Ennalum enthenthu yachikilum
Epozhum nalkidunna’ythellam
Prathana kelkum nayakan than
Vakku maratha vallabhanam;-5 Rakshyin parayayi thernnavanil
Pakshmayi charidum najan ennume
Than’daya ennu keerthikume
Than namam vazthi vanagidume;-

song.slide2:
Yakobe! Nee enthineevidathil chida-
Bharangal kondullilandanay therunnu
Misreyil vannu nin bharamozichavan
Chengadal vattichon nin munpilundini1 Preuvellam kandal nee lesaham kalangenda
Agniyil nee vekatheyennum najan kathidum
Ninmukam enthini kshoniyil vilarunnu
Enthini nin manam chindayal vadunnu;-2 Aavarthana’shakthi enmakalkekidum najan
Kathiruneedukil shakthanaytheerum nee
Kazhukan’pol nee parannathunnathattilai
Swarga’sthalangail jeevichu vazhu nee;-3 Ayiramayiram koda’kodi marthayar
Kashi’mekunna van nadiyakum nee
Venalkalavum varsham ennulla bedam nin
Veliyillathorku van nadiyakum nee;-4 Eppozum santhosapurnayi nine najan
Ipparil palichen kaikalil sukshikum
Kannilmanipole nine ninchu najan
En marvileppozum nine vahichidum;-5 Alayunee lokathin oolangal kandu nee
Valayunnathenthi’ennoman-pthaythale?
Visvasa’kappalil mokshapuram noki
Yathracheyum bhaktharkelokam kshaneekam

isahaakkin daivam ente daivam (2)
aaraadhippan shakathan sthuthichidaan yogyan (2)
ie daivathe namukkinn’aaraadhikkaam
yahenna daivathe aaraadhichedaamnamukkaraadhikkaam namukkaraadhikkaam
avan vilichaal kelkkunna daivamallo
namukkaraadhikkaam namukkaraadhikkaam
avan paapangal pokkunna daivamallo (2)2 daivam nalkiya daanangale orthu nithyam namichidaam
daivam nadathiya paathakale kandu modaal vaazhthidaam;
namme karam pidichanudinam nadathunna vidhangale
sthuthichu nithyam aaraadhikkaam (2)
iee loka yaathrayil thalaraathe munneraan
yaahenna daivathe aaraadhichidaam (2);- namukkaraa...3 Shathruvin kaiyyil akappedaathe karuthiya nathhane namichidaam
rogapeedayil thalarnnidathe thaangiya karthane vaazthidaam;
namme thirurakthathaalennum kazhuki thalodunna
karangale orthennum sthuthichidaam (2)
veendum varaamennu vaagdathamekiya
yaahenna daivathe aaraadhichidaam (2);- namukkaraa...

song.slide2:
1 Yakobin davivam innum namukkullavan
Namme-jeevaparyantham kaathidume
Oro dhivasavum kripa-nalki namme
Immanuvelavan thaan nadatheedumeHalleluyah avan aathmarakshakan
Halleluyah avan soukaydhaayakan
Halleluyah shudha-athmadhaayakan name
Nithyathakkai orukeedume2 Aazhiyil naam kadannu poyeedilum-athu
Namme kavingidaathe kaathidume
Theeyil naam aakilum jwaala namme thellum
Esaa-thimmaanuvel thaan nadatheedume;-3 Saakshaal rogangal avan vahichathinaal
Ellaa vedanayum avan chumannathinaal
Adippinaraal avan soukyamakki innum
Immaanuvelavan thaan nadatheedume;-4 Seeyon prayaanikale aanandippin-nammal
Dhukkavum neduveerpum oodeedume
Nithyaanandam nammil pakarnnu namme innum
Immaanuvelavan thaan nadatheedume;-5 Jalasaaliyaayavan vanneedume ella
Prathiphalavu-mavan thannedume!
Aathmaavinaalathinaayoruki-namme
Innum immaanuve-lavan thaan nadatheedume;-

Yakobin vallabante bhuja-balathal
Viduthalunde Viduthalunde
Shalemin rajanam yeshuvingal
Veendedupullatinal 1 Maranathin pashangal chuttiyalum
Pathala-vednakal jarukiyalum

Yathrayennu therumo darithriyil
Anthy-naleth’ethra duramakumo
Yathra’yennu therumo en rakshka
Aarthi’yeridunnu ninte nalinayi;-1 Shipramami jeevitham kazinjupom
Nitya’jeevitham namuku labyamam
Athma’nayakante rajayametrayo
Mohana’mathennu kanumeza najan;-2 Yeshu’vaneiku bhuvil’asrayam
Bhagya’shaliyanu najan dharithriyil
Anyanayorikalayirunnu najan
Iee van krupayin-ohariku yognayi;-3 Ethrayo mahatwa’mami rakshaye
Marthaya-nameniku nalkiyennathal
Aayussinte nal muzhuvaneppozum
Vazthidum thiru mahtha’meza najan;-

song.slide2:
Yerushalemen imba veede eppol njaan vannu cherum
dharaniyile paadum kedum eppol ingozhiyum (2)1 Bhaktharin bhaagya thalame !
Parimala sthalam neeye !
dhukham vichaaram prayathnam
Ninkhalangille; - Yeru2. Raavum aadhakaaram veyil
sheethavum angille !
deepa thullyam shudharangu
shobhicheedunne;- Yeru3. Ratnangalallo ninmathil
ponnum maanickangal !
panthrandu nin vaathikkalum
minnum muthallo;- Yeru4. Yerusalemin inpa veede
ennu njaan vannu cherum !
parama raajaawin mahathavam
arikil- kandeedum;- Yeru5 Shreshta nada klkaavulum
thottnagalum ellaaam
kaattuvaa-ninayillaatha
koottamaramgal;- Yeru6. Jeevanadhi impa shabdham
mevi athiloode
povathum eeraaru vruksham
nilppathum modi;- Yeru7. Dhootharum angaarthu sadhaa
swaramdalam paadi
Naadhane kondaatitunna
Gheetham maa modi;- Yeru8. Yenusalenin adhipanesho
thirumun njaan sthuthi paadaan
varum vareyum arikil bhavaan
erikkennaam naadhaa;- Yeru

song.slide2:
1 Yeshu aarilum unnathanamen athma-sakavavane
Thai-marakamenkilum enne maraka snehithane
Evarumenne kaivedinjalum
Yeshu than ennarikil varume
Ethu kedhavum theerum najan thiru maarvil charidumpol2 Enne-thedi vin-nagaram vittu-ziyil vannavane
Ente papa-sapamakattan jeevane thannavanam
Endhinum ha! than thiru sneha
Paasa bendha-mazhikuvan kazhiya-
thennu-mennum najanini avanilum avanini ennilumam;-3 Manasame charuka dhinavum ie nalla-snehithanil
Dyanam cheyuka than thirusneha-madhurima
Sandhathavum - Ethu khedam varikilum pathara-
Yeshuvil nina-asrayam karuthi
Andhyatholam poruthuka kurishin uthamanam bhadanai;-

song.slide2:
Yeshu en aathma sakhe
nin maarvil njaan cheratte
Ie loakamaam vaaridhe
Thirakal uyarunne
Khoaramaam kol saanthamaai
Theerum vare Rekshaka
En jeevane kakkuka
Nin anthike bhadramaaiVerey Sangethamille
Enikkaasrayam nee thaan
Nadhaa kaivediyalle
Kaathu rekshikka sadha
Karthaa nee en aashrayam
Thruppadham en sharanam
Nin chirakin keeshennum
Cherthu sookshicheedenamKristho, en aavashyangal
Ninnaal niraverunnu
Ezhakal niraashrayarkke
Aadhaaram neeyaakunnu
Neethimaan nee nirmalan
Maha mlechan njaan muttum
Paapi njaan maa paapi njan
Krupa sathyam, nee muttumKaarunya varaannidhe,
Kanmasham Kazhukuke
Nithya jeeva vellamen
chitham shudhamaakkatte
Jeevannuravaam nadha
Njanere kudikkatte
Ennullil uyaruka
Nithyakaalamokkave.

song.slide2:
1 Yeshu en pakshamai theernnathinal
Enthoranandamee bhoovil vasam
Ha! Etramodham parthalathil jeevikum nal2 Lokam veruthavaresuvodu
Chernnirunneppozhum aswasikum
Ma bhagya-kanan cherum vare kathidenam3 Ie lokam akshepam cholliyalum
Dhushtar parihasam othiyalum
En prana nathan poyathaya patha mathi4 Vegam vara-mennuracha natha
Noki noki kankal mangeedunne
Eppol varumo pranapriya kandiduvan5 Lokamenikoraswasamai
kanunnille ente prananatha
Nal thorumeni-kaswasamai theernnidene

song.slide2:
1 Yeshu en sanketham en nithiya parayume
Aasrayam than mathram aa namam susthirame
Pilarnna-thorikal krusil chorinja rekthamathal
Valarnnu najan daivapaithal than maha-snehathal;-2 Yogyamallatha ee lokathilerunna malinyngal
Margathilerivannenne bhethi-peduthidumpol
Charum najan kalvari-mettil thakarnna maridathil
Thorum kannuneerellam yeshuvin kaikalil;-3 Lokathinnasrayamonnum sashwathamallakayal
Soka-kodumkattilude odi-marayunnu najan
Dhoore dhoore kanunnen nithya bhavanathe
Vegam najan angu-cherum athethra bhagyame;-4 Kankal-kimpamaya thokeyum naswarame
Mannil bhagyamellam mari maranjidume
Vedhana mathramengum jeevitha nalukalil
Modhangal mathramanennum sworgeeya nadathil;-5 Muzhangum kahalamellam gembhira-nadathode
Dhonikum daivathin sabdham visuthar-uyarkume
Theja’sampoorna’mesu megathil vannidumpol
Jyothi’supol enna’nnekum than-kude vazhum naam;-6 Rathriyillathoru desam ennekum parppidamai
Marthyamallathoru vesham prapikum nischayamai
Ennamillatha visudhar pon’kuruthola’yumai
Varnnikum daivathin neethi sworgeeya’ganathal;-

song.slide2:
1 Yeshu enikethra nallavanaam
Kleshameshaathenne kaathavanaam
Taazhchakal vannaalum veezhchakal vannaalum
Thaangi nadathuvaan vallabhanaamEkkaalathum than bakthare
Thrukkayyaal thaangi nadathumavan
Kashttathayil nal thuna thaan
Dhukkathil aaswaasadaayakan thaan2 Ullam kalangum prayaasam vannaal
Undenikkabhaya sthanamonnu
Uttavar snehithar vittupoyennaalum
Unnathan marilla kaividilla;-3 Vaana vidhaanathil dhootharumai
Vannu vilikkumbol aa kshanathil
Mannil maranjaalum mannil-irunnaalum
Vinnil than sannidhow chernnidum njaan;-4 Aazhiyil paadha orukkumavan
Asrithekkaapathozhikkumavan
Aa divya paadhatil aasrayichoraarum
Aalempa heenaraai theernnathilla;-

song.slide2:
1 Ye’su e’nn swan-tham, Halleluiah,
E’nnude bhagyam chollikooda,
Pazhayathellam kazhinju poyi,
Kandaalum saravam puthiyathaiEniku paattum prasamshayum
Daiva kunjaadum than kurishum2 Yeshu en swan-tham, Halleluiah,
Theernnu en-andhyam, neengi raavum
Eruttin paasham aruthu than,
Jee-vaprakaasham kaanunnu najan;-3 Yeshu en swan-tham Halleluiah,
Thuranna swargam kaanunnitha
Paapam than neekki raktha-thinaal
Deiva kunjaakki athmaavinal;-4 Yeshu en swan-tham, Halleluiah,
Padan enninpam pora en vaay
Jeevante vellam thanuppinai
Jeevante appam en shakthikai;-5 Yeshu en swan-tham, Halleluiah,
Eee sneha bandham nilkum sada
Maranatholam snehichu than,
Nithyathayolam suchikkum than;-6 Yeshu en swan-tham, Halleluiah,
Najan nin sambaadhayam en rakshakaa
Neyen karthaavum snehethanum
Jeeva-daddavum sakalavum;-

1 Yeshu ennabhyakendram
Maattamilla snehithan
Sthothram sthuthikalkku yogyan
Vaazhthum ninne ennum njaan2 Enne shudhikaricheedan
Baalashiksha nalkiyaal
Thaathanu nanni karettidum
Halleluiah paadidum3 Vyaakulangal nerittaalum
Bharamullil vannaalum
Rogiyai theernnennaalum
Yeshuvil njaan chaaridum.4 Yeshu rajanenne cherppaan
Megharoodanai varum
Aakulangalilla naattil

song.slide2:
Yeshu ennadi-sthanam aasha-yavani lathre
Aashwa-sa-thin poor-natha, Yeshuvil kanden najanum1 Ethra-madhura-mavan nama-menikku parthal,
Orthu varum thorume,-nnarthi man-ju pokunnu;-2 Dhukkam dhari-drya menni,vaykkundo sha’kthiyen-mel
Kaikku pidichu nadathi kondu pokunnavan;-3 Rogamenne pidichen, deham kshayichcalume
Vegam varumen nadhan deham puthuthakeedan;-4 Papa-tha-lennil vanna shapakara-kal matti
Shobhitha neethi vasthram, abharanamai nalkum;-5 Vanbicha lokathira kkambam theeru-volavum
Mumbum pinbum mayavan anpodenne nadathum;-6 Loka menikku vyirri, loka menne thyajichal
Shoka-menthenikkathil ethum bhayappeda njaan;-7 Vekkam than manavatti-yakedumenneyennu
Vakkundenikku thante neekamilla-thinottum;-

song.slide2:
Yeshu ennulla naamame lokam
engun vishesha naamameNaashamundaakkum paapa- naasham varuthaan para
Meshan jagathin marhya- vesham dharichuvannaMunnam Gabriel vin dhoothan-chonna
Moksha nirmitha naamame
Kanni mariam keltu
mannitathengum bhaagyam
varuthum vallabhva naamam;- YeshuAarkkum chollaakunna naamam-engum
Aaradhippaanulla naamam
peikkum peyin patakkum
bheethi cherkkunna naamam
moorkha paapikalkkum vi-
moksham nalkunna naamam;- YeshuMannar chakkravarthikalum vaazhthi
vannicheedum mahaanaamam
vinnin gheethathi naamm
vedhandha saara naamam
punnyam perltha naamam
bhoovil prakaaasa naamam;- YeshuVin mannum chertheedum naamam-Japam
vinnil kodaadunna naamam
nayam nidhi paranil
Nyaayam neethikrupaikum
Unmayam sakshiyaayll
Uyamnu thoongiya naamam;- YeshuKal nenchudakkunna naamam - mana
kkaadaake vettunna naamam
Ennum puthiyathupol
earay madhura naamam
thannil pala saarangal
dharichirikkunna naamam;- Yeshu

song.slide2:
Yeshu ennullaththil vanna naalil
Enthumaatam vnnuu ennil
Thanne jaan-ullaththil-etathaale
Enthumodam vannu ennilVan vinakal than naduvil sahayameki
Ente paapa bhara’mellaam thanmeleti
Kroosil than’chora en’per’kkaayooti
Enthu maatam vannu ennil;- (2) yeshu…Ijjagathil maalinyangal neekki mutum
Swanthamaakki ente papabandham maati
Than pithaavothu thaan bandameki
Enthumaatam vannu ennil;- (2) yeshu…Ponninam thannen vilayaay veendukol-vaan
Ennumennum njaanavantethonnu maathram
Dehamen dehiyothmaavum
Enthumaatam vannu ennil;- (2) yeshu…En vazhiyil dur-ghadangngal ellaam neekki
Enteyaasa ente laakkum onnumaathram
Illini mruthyuvin bheethiyennil
Enthumaatam vannu ennil;- (2) yeshu…Raathrikaalam theernnidaraayi-prabhaathamethi
Prabhaathathaaram yesu-vaanil veedaaraayi
Ennumen gaanamithonnu maathram
Enthumaatam vannu ennil;- (2) yeshu…

Avanenne nadaththeedunnu alayaathe marubhoomiyil (2)Ente desam ivideyalla ee lokam saasvathamallaa

Ezhayamee yennai snehichesu vethra nallavan2 Swargabhagyam vittenikku nithya-baggiamekuvan

song.slide2:
Yeshu maheshane jaan chinthipp-athen
Ullathinaanadhame-Eashannude thiru sannidhicher-nnini
Vishraman eheithu thante thiru-mukham
Kaanunathathyaanadha may
Vaanasainyangalkkum maaanusha jaathikkum
Oouamillathe ninne varnikkuvaan
Saadhyamathaakayilla-Maanusha rekshakaa- ninnute naamampol
Vaanilum bhoonilum ille oru
Naamann nippathinnu-Ullam nuringiyorkkulla prathyaash ayum
nalla prasaadhavum nee -Sarveswaraa
Saumyathayullavarke-Ethra dhayaaparan veezhunnavarkkeshu
ethra nalla gunavaan thedeedunna
marthyaganan galkku thaanKandeedum maanavarkenthorah-laadham nee
Undo naavum penayum varnikkuvaan
aanalla sannarbhatheyYeshuvin snehama thenthennu-eholluvaan
aaswadhichorkkallaathe matt aarkkuma
saadhya mariujeedwaan

song.slide2:
Yesu mahonnathane mahonnathane
Vegam kaanaam
Mal-prema kanthane kaanaamSundhara-roopane njaan
Ie meghamathil vegam kaanaam
Malprema kaanthane kaanaam
Kashtathayere sahichavarum
Kallerad’iyidi kondu marichavarannu
Mashihayodu vaazhumaanaattil;-Ponmani maalayavan enikku tharum
Shubra vasthram
Nadhanenne dharippikkumannu
Kannuneeraake ozhinjeedume
Aayiramaandu vasikkumavanude naattil
Enikkayorukkiya veettil;-Raappakalillavide prasobhithamayoru nadu
Naalu jeevikal paadumavide
Jeva-jelanadhi yundavide
Jeeva marangalumai nila kondoru desham
Nalloru Bhoovana dhesham;-

Yesu mahonnathane ninakku
Sthothramundaka yennekkum AmenNeecharam njangale veendiduvan
Vanalokam vedinjodi vannu
Thanu narakruthi poondathine
Kanuvan nee krupa chaiyenameVana senathikalin sthuthiyum
Anandamam swarga bhagyamathum
Heenarayidumi njangalude
Oonamakuttuvanai vedinjoBoothale chutti nee sancharichu
Papikale arike vilichu
Neethiyin margamellamurachu
Vedana yettavum nee sahichuPapanivarananaya ninmel
Papamaseshavum ettukondu
Papa belikku nin chora chinthi
Parin madhyae marathil marichaIee yupakaramente manasil
Rappakalorthu ninnodananju
Lokayimpangale thalliduvan
Nee krupa chairka dinamprethiye

en manatharilavan vaneedum

song.slide2:
Yeshu manavalan namme cherkuvan
Madhya vanil velippeduvan
Kalam aasannamai priyare
Orungam vishudhiyode;-Cherum nam vegathil impa veedathil
kanum nam annalil priyan ponmugamYudhangalum kshamavum bhookampavum
Adikadi uyarnnidumpol
Kandhan yeshu varan kalamai
Orungam vishuthiyode;-Roga-dhukangalum maranamathum
Thellum nee bhayappedathe
Dheham mannodu chernnennalum
Roopandaram prapikum;-Chadu chade uyarkum vishudharellam
Kahala nadham kelkumpol
Paaril.. paarthidum nam annalil
Roopandharam prapikum;-

Yeshu mathi maruvil enikkasrayippan dinavum (2)
Thirumarvil charum nerathil theerum
Aakulangalokkayum (2)Vallabhan nallavan enikkettam uthaman
Varnyamallorikkalum enikkavante maadhuryam (2)
Yesu mathi maruvil enikkasrayippan dinavum (2)Avan nallavanennadhikam
Aaswadhikkum naadha ninnil njaan
Avanil saranapettathaal
Ethra dhanya maayen jeevitham (2);- Vallabhan…Njaaninnu deiva paithalai
Enikkai thaan karuthukayal
Ente bhaaram muttum theerthu than
Enne thangidunnu kripayal (2);- Vallabhan…Paarilente alpanalukal theeranam
Thruppathasevayil
Pinneyente Yesuvin maril
Mraranju visraamamnedum njaan (2);- Vallabhan..

song.slide2:
Yeshu naathaa neethisurya ekanam ninnatmadhanam
Dhasarilleesamyathil naadhane
Sarva malozhichu divya dhaanam nalkukaInnu ninte sannidhiyil vannirikkkum njangale nee
Ninte divyashisham nalki palikka sarva
Maya chintadoorai neekki kakkukaAatma dhadhavaya ninne
Soawthamakki theerthiduvaan
Aatmadhaanam njangalil nee nalkuka sarva
Svarthachitham dhoore neekki kakkukaNinte snehamarinjittum ninne snehippathinnayi
Snehaheenarayavaril veghame - nitya
Sneharoopanaya ninne kattukaNee pozhikkum theinmozhikal
njangal ullilakkiduvan
Param kothi nalkeedenam dheivame ellam
Chaithu nalla dhasarayitheeruvan

song.slide2:
Yeshu’naathaa nin krupakkai sthothramennekkum
Eeshane nin naamamente klesha-makattumNaashamayanaayorennil Jeevanarulaan – van
Krooshine sahichapa- maanam vahichru;- YeshuPaavanamaan neethiyil nja-nennumirippaan –ninte
Jeevaniloramshameni-kkekiyathinaal;- YeshuNin hrudhuyam thannilenne munkurrichappol
En jananam thanneyum njaa nannarinjille;- YeshuThan jada shareera maranam nimithan nee
Nin pithaavotenne nirappichathu moolam;- YeshuEthrakaalam nin krupaye vyardhamaakki njaan
Athranaahiumandhakaaram- thannilirunnen;- YeshuJeeva'lathayaaya ninnil njaan nila nilppaan-nin
Jeeva resa mennilennum thannu paalikka;- YeshuVishranna dhesathelee njaa-nethum varekkum-nin
Vishrutha krupakalenne pinthutarenam;- Yeshu

song.name: Yeshu nallavan Yeshu vallabhan
song.slide:
യേശു നല്ലവൻ യേശു വല്ലഭൻ
ആശ്രിതർക്കെല്ലാം താൻ പരിചയാം
ഇന്നലെയും ഇന്നുമെന്നുംതാൻ അനന്യനാം (2)
വന്നീടുംവേഗം നമ്മെ തന്നിൽ ചേർത്തീടാൻ1.ഈശാനമൂലനാം കൊടുങ്കാറ്റിനാൽ ഈ
വിശ്വാസ ജീവിത തോണി അലഞ്ഞീടുമ്പോൾ
വിശ്വാസ നായകൻ താൻ കൂടെ വരും
പ്രശാന്തമാക്കീടും വൻ കാറ്റും കോളും
അങ്ങെകരയിൽ നമ്മെ എത്തിക്കുവാൻ (2)
ഇങ്ങമരത്തുണ്ടു രക്ഷാ നായകൻ2.ശത്രുവിൻ കഠിനമാം വൻചൂളയിൽകൂടി
മിത്രമായി ദൈവപുത്രൻ കൂടെ നടന്നീടും
കെട്ടുകൾ പൊട്ടിച്ചു നമ്മെ സ്വതന്ത്രരാക്കി
ഒട്ടും മാറാതെ വല്ലഭൻ വഴി നടത്തും
സിംഹകുഴിയിലും നാഥൻ ഇറങ്ങി വരും (2)
മഹാരക്ഷ നല്കി കാന്തൻ വിടുവിക്കും
song.slide2: <slide><slide><slide>

song.slide2:
1 Yeshu nallavan avan vallabhan
Avan dhayayo ennumullhathu
Peruvellathin irachilpole
Sthuthichidukaa avante naamamHalleluiah - Halleluiah (2)
Mahathwavum njaanavum Sthothravum bhahumaanam
Shakthiyum bhalavum enneshuvine2 Najaan Yahovakkay kaathu-kaathallo
Avan enghalekku chaanju vannallo
Naashakaramaaya kuzhiyil ninnum
Kuzhanja chaettil-ninnum kayatti;-3 Ente karthaave ente Yahove
Neeyozhike enikkoru nammayumilla
Bhoomiyiulla vishudhanmaaro
Avar enikku shre-sahtanmaar thane;-4 Ente kaalkale paramel nirthi
En gamanathe susthiramaakki
Puthiyoru paatt-enikku thannu
En dhaivathinu sthuthi thane;-

Yeshu namathe uyarthidam
Athbutha namathe uyarthidam
Yeshu bhuvil vannu enne rakshippan
Yeshu krushithanay en jeevanay
avan marichuyirthu nitya rajanay
nee ennum ente rakshakanYeshu raajanente swanthame

Lord I love to sing Your praises
I’m so glad You’re in my life
I’m so glad you came to save usYou came from heave to earth to show the way
From the earth to the cross my debts to pay
From the cross to the grave
From the grave to the sky
Lord I lift Your name on high (2)

song.slide2:
Yeshu nayaka papa shapa nashaka
Veendedutha nin jenathin alma dayaka1 Kandu njanee daivasneham-eesan krusinmel
Pandu njanarinjathillennorthu neerunne
Undeniku nadu melil ennathorkumpol
Vendeniku misraimin nikshepangale;-2 Nin varavin lekshyangalumengum kanunne
Jathi-jathiyodu porinnayuthangalal
Vyathi-mulam kethikunnee manavarellam
Kshamavum bhookampavum avidavideyai;-3 Anthyakala sampavangalale bhoovanam
Marakayuthangalale loka rashtrangal
Sayudha samarathinai kalamorukunne
Kandhane nin varavinendhu thamasikunne;-4 Velli ponnumalla enne veendeduthathe
Nisthulla ninam karunayal kazhukayai
Vasthuthakal varnnyamallathente navinal
Karthan kroosil nirvahicha daiva-nirnnayam;-5 Kannu kandittilla vinnin bhavi roopangal
Kelpathilla sworga zion impa-nadhangal
Onnu njanariyunnedhan vasamorkumpol
Mannidam marannu ganamannu-paadume;-

song.slide:
യേശു രാജാ വരികാ വേഗം
ഈ ഭൂമിയെ നീതിയിൽ ഭരിപ്പാൻ
വേഗം വരാമെന്നുര ചെയ്ത
കർത്താധികർത്താ വേഗം വരികാ1.ഈ ലോകം പാപത്താൽ നിറഞ്ഞും
അശുദ്ധി ദിനം ദിനം ഉയർന്നും
ദൈവ ഭയം ലേശമില്ലാത്ത തലമുറകൾ വരുന്നല്ലോ
ദൈവത്തെ വേണ്ടാത്തൊരു വലിയ കുട്ടത്തെ ഇതാ നാം കാണുന്നു2.ക്രിസ്തുവിൻ നാമം ധരിച്ചോർ
തന്നെയതിൻ ശക്തി ഇല്ലാതാക്കീടുന്നു
ഭക്തിയിൻ വേഷം ധരിച്ചു ക്രിസ്തു നാമത്തെ ദുഷിക്കുന്നോർ ഏറുന്നു
സാത്താന്യ ശക്തിയെ മുഴുവൻ നിത്യമായ് ജയിച്ചു കീഴടക്കി
യേശുവിൻ നാമം മാത്രമെന്നും ഈ ഭൂവിലെങ്ങും ഉയരട്ടെ3.ക്രൂശിൻ സ്നേഹം നമ്മിൽകൂടി
ഉലകം മുഴുവനും ഇന്നും അറിയട്ടെ
മനസ്സലിവിൻ ഹ്യദയം നമ്മിലും ലോകമെങ്ങും കാണട്ടെ
ആരും നശിച്ചു പോകാതിരിപ്പാൻ
നമ്മുക്കൊരുമിച്ചു പ്രവർത്തിക്കാം.

song.slide2:
1 Yeshu rekshithaven swondha-mayathal
Najanavan sandhanam aaitheernnathal
Endhu-modham ente andharangathil
Paadum najan santhoshathal;-Reksha-danamo athethra maathuryam
Enne veendatho athetra aacharyam
Karthen swondha-maittenne theerthathal
Keerthikum njan nandhiyal2 Rekshaka ninnishtam niravettuvan
Neekuka ennishtam muttumen bhavan
Nadathenne ninnalbhutha margathil
Paalikenne krupayil;-3 Poril najan thalarnnu veenupokaivan
Sathru ente mel jayam kondeedaivan
Yeshuve nin sakthi ennum nalkuke
Aalmaval nirakuke;-4 Sworge vannu ninne njan kandeedumpol
Ente sarva-kedham annu theerumpol
Karthane najan modhal chumbichidume
Hallelujah paadume;-

song.slide2:
Yeshu sannidhi mama bhagyam
Klesammaatti mahaasanthosham ekunna
Sudhatmavanudinamennullil vasichenne
Parthippan padippikkunnerame-ppozhum
Daivavachanamathil dhianicheeduvanathi
Raavile than paadam praapikkunneram
Papathaalasudhenai theerum sameyamanu
Thaapahrudeyamode njananayumpol
Lokachithakalakum bharachumedathinal
Akulappettu thalarnneedunna neram
Dukhengal hrudheyathe muttum-thakartheedumpol
Okkeyum sahicheedan sakthi nalkunnaYaathoru sameyamennanthathay-athumoolam
Paathayariyathe njaan valayumpol
Thakkasameyamellahmuttum preyasavum than
Makkalkku theerthukodutheedunnoren
Sathruvin pareekshayen nere vanneedunnoru
Mathreyil jeyamnalki rekshicheedunna
Mannidamathiente kannadanjathin sesham
Ponnu lokavasathil ennum ennekkum

song.name: Yeshu ullathamen jeevitham
song.slide:
1.യേശു ഉള്ളതാമെൻ ജീവിതം
ആശ നിറഞ്ഞതായി ജീവിതം
നാശത്തിൻ പാതയിൽ പോയ ഞാനും
വിശ്വസിച്ചേശുവിൽ ഭാഗ്ഗ്യവശാൽ
യേശു ഉള്ളതാമെൻ ജീവിതം
ആശ നിറഞ്ഞതായി ജീവിതം2.സ്നേഹത്തിൻ സാഗരം തങ്ങിനിൽക്കുമീശൻ
കണ്ണുകളെ കാണുമൊരുന്നാൾ
ദുഃഖം സങ്കടം കരുമനകൾ നീക്കിഞാൻ (2)
ജീവിക്കുന്നാശയോടെ.
യേശു ഉള്ളതാമെൻ ജീവിതം
ആശ നിറഞ്ഞതായി ജീവിതം3. ആണിപാടുള്ളതാം പാദങ്ങളിൽ വീണു
വണങ്ങുന്നു പ്രാണേശനെ
ത്രാണിയില്ലാത്ത ഈപ്രാണിയെയും സ്നേഹിച്ച (2)
കാരുണ്യം ഓർത്തുക്കൊണ്ടിന്നും.
യേശു ഉള്ളതാമെൻ ജീവിതം
ആശ നിറഞ്ഞതായി ജീവിതം

song.slide2:
Yeshu vara'rayi kristhesu vara'rayi
Kettidum nam kahaladawani;
Mathra’neramani paril jeevitham vegam
Karthan vela cheyithu therthidamVishvasa kannukal uyarthidam
Porinte aayudam vedingidam
Athmavin shakthiyal niranjidam
Sargeeya santhosham pankidamVishvasha verarayi munneridam
Aashvasa’dayakanil charidam
Anthayam vare karuthum karthanam
Aarilum unnathen en YeshuvamLakshyam thettathe nere oodidam
Aashicha deshamethum nalvare
Ieeloka santhosham nashvaram ente
Parthyasha yeshvil mathramam

Yeshu varum vegathil-aashvaasame
Yeshuvarum vegathil-KristheshuMegham than therum- anekaraam dhutharum
shekharippaan thannilekkalla shudhare-
Deivathe salthyathil seva chilthavarkku
Chaavine jayichu than jeevane kodppaanThanthiru varavinnaai santhatham kaathavar
Anthmillaathoru samthoshan labhippaanBhruthyanmaar thaan chaitha salthy a prakkaram
Nithya mahathvathin raajyathil vaazhaanThan janathinellaa ninnaye neekki
Anpulla kaikondu kannuneer thutappaanThan thiru mughathe naam kankondu kandu
Santhushtamayennum than naamam sthuthippaanLokathin chinthakal pokaltteyellaam
Eka prathyasha ingaaka en-Yeshu

Yeshu varunne ponneshu varunne
Varavinaye than vachanam poal nee orungidunnuvo1 Ivide kayari varuvinenna dayva shabdam'kel
ppathinu-vendi unarunnu nee orungidunnuvo;-2 Amparathin shakthikal bramichidunnathaal
Amparappinaalee lokam nadungee-dunnithaa;-3 Neekkum loaka vaazhcha-yessu raaja raajanaaye
Sthaapikkum swargeeya vaazhcha than vissudhar-kkaaye;-4 Mulmudi aninju raktha-dhaariyaayavan
Ponkireedam choodi theja-poornnanaayitha;-5 Dayvan than vissudhan-maarin kannuneerellaam
Neekkiyekum nithya-jeevan-ennaneekkumaaye;-6 Haa! swarggeeya naalathin prabhaathamayitha
Haayen priyan vaanil dhootha senayoadithaa;-

Paralokathil jeevikkunnu
Iha’lokathil thaanni vaegum varum
Raja’raajanaay vaanhiduvaanHa-halleluiah jayam halleluiah

1 Yeshumathiyenikkeshumathi
kleshangal maathram sahichennaalum
Appozhum paadum njaan daivame
Neeyethrra nallavanNeeyalla’thaarumillee’shane ente bhaaram theerppaan
Neeyalla’thaarulloo rakshakaa ente paapam pokkaan
enne nee etukol daivame appol njaan dhanyanaam2 Jeevitha bhaarangal eriyaalum
Jeeva’naathan kaivediyukilla
enne nadathuvaan shakthanaam
Neeyethra nallavan!;- Neeyallaa...3 Lokathil ekanaay theerukilum
rogathaal baadhithan’aayidilum
enne kaividaatha rakshakaa
Neeyethra nallavan!;- Neeyallaa...4 Eeriya thetukal cheythennaalum

song.slide2:
Yeshuraajan vegam thante vanna samoohamathai
Vanneedunnee lokathinte raajavai vazhvaanaiYesuraajan varunnundu lokathil vaazhuvanai
Eavarodum kalpikkunnundu orungikolvanaiYesuraajan veendum loke meghathil vannidumpol
Cherkkum than visudhanmare megathil thannodannu;-Innu njangal dukhikkunnundu lokathil ninnitharai
Annu njangal aanandhicheedum Dootharaal vandhitharai;-Innu njangal vedhanayode ghoshikkum suvishesham
Annu njangal rekshakan koode vaanidum sworgadeshe;-Vannenkil nee innuthanne yesuvin kroosathinkal
Cherukkum thante kode Ninee nithyam than varavinkal;-

song.slide2:
Yeshurajan varunnitha nashalokam thakarunne
Daivajaname unarnnipol thalakaluyarthippaduvinEzhunnu shobhippen deepam theliyippen
Parannupokan kalamettam aduthuvarunnithaYudhashabadam muzhagunne kaahalagalutharaay
Ethra vegam unarnnu nee shakathiye puthukkuka;- ezhu..Jathijathiyoditha rajyamegum poruthunne
Jathikal nirashayaal paribhramikkum kaalamaay;- ezhu..Daiva’sabhaya’thunaratte anubhavagal kaanatte
Samayam lesham kalayathe arumanathane sakshippin;- ezhu..Aadyasneham vishvasam aadima’prathishdayum
Puthukki jeevithathe nee kathusukshicheeduka;- ezhu..Nin vicharanayile aattinkuttam muzhuvanum
Dushdajanthu thottidathe jaagarichu kaathukol;- ezhu..Idayashreshadan velippedan kalamaduthu’varunnitha
Kuli thante kayyilum prathiphalavumaayithaa;- ezhu..Nin kireedam aarumeduthidathe sukshikka
Jeevitha’vasthrathe nee venmayaakkikkolluka;- ezhu..

Yeshuve nee ente sangethamakayal
Padum njan jeevithakalam
En shashwatha parayum jeevante margavum
Nee mahram ennude nadanNeeyen sharanam neeyen sanketham
Nee en kavalum kottayum nityam
Lokam muzuvan marippoyeedilum
Nin mattamilla daya ennennum satyamNeeyen jeevaum neeyen almavum

Ini’akulam ennil leshamilla
Iee loke njan bhagyavanakunnu nityam;-Ninnil ashrayam vaikunnevarkum
Nee sanketham nalkunna daivam
Ini aasrayam vaikillarilum – en
Yeshuvil aasrayam vaikum njan nityam;-

Enthoru bagyamithe-

Annumen-yeshuvin anbin
Karangalil saadhu njaan visramikkum-
Halleluiah - Amen - Ha - Halleluiah
